short_description:
• Tool-Tra-Top® with drill holster, convenient tray for tools/paint and small parts
  • Sturdy molded paint can hanger on back side of top

name: Blue Armor 2000 H1321 Construction (3 D Rings) Harness
Group_Name: Blue Armor 2000 H1321 Construction (3 D Rings) Harness
meta_title: Blue Armor 2000 H1321 Construction (3 D Rings) Harness
meta_description: Werner Blue Armor 2000 harnesses are designed and manufactured for the most demanding applications and the most serious professional user.
small_image_label: Blue Armor 2000 H1321 Construction (3 D Rings) Harness
thumbnail_label: Blue Armor 2000 H1321 Construction (3 D Rings) Harness
description: Werner Blue Armor 2000 harnesses are designed and manufactured for the most demanding applications and the most serious professional user.
short_description:
Features:
  • 5-point adjustments for optimal fit
  • Hip D-rings for positioning applications
  • Includes padded, removable work belt capable of holding tools
  • Large back pad with breathable, sweat absorbing foam helps keep harness untangled when donning
  • Quick connect buckles on chest
  • Shoulder pads for user comfort
  • Tongue buckle legs straps, ideal when multiple workers use the same harness
  • WebAlert inspectable webbing makes wear and damage visible and obvious, and with multiple impact ind
summary:
Werner Blue Armor 2000 harnesses are designed and manufactured for the most demanding applications and the most serious professional user. Unique wear indicating webbing and impact indicators allow for easy inspection. They feature 5-point adjustments for optimal fit, lightweight hardware and pads, and bright colors for worker visibility on the jobsite. The back pad is large enough to protect the user's back, padded to absorb sweat and feel comfortable, and designed to prevent tangling when donning the harness. Shoulder pads provide additional user comfort. The rear dorsal D-ring is made from high quality forged alloy steel for strength and durability. Hip D-rings for positioning applications. Made for general construction, these harnesses are designed for tool carrying capabilities with a removable body belt. Quick connect chest buckle. Tongue buckle leg straps are simple, fast, easy, and ideal when more than one worker could use the same harness.


Specifications
  • Back D-Ring: Yes
  • Back Padding: Yes
  • Belt: Tool
  • Chest Strap Buckle: quick connect
  • Family: BlueArmor2000
  • Front D-Ring: No
  • Good/Better/Best: Best
  • Inspectable Webbing: Yes
  • Lanyard Keeper: Yes
  • Leg Strap Buckles: tongue buckle
  • Seat Sling: No
  • Shoulder D-Rings: No
  • Shoulder Padding: Yes
  • Side D-Rings: Yes
  • Style: Construction (3 D Rings)
meta_keyword: Blue Armor 2000 H1321 Construction (3 D Rings) Harness

summary:
Werner Blue Armor 2000 harnesses are designed and manufactured for the most demanding applications and the most serious professional user. Unique wear indicating webbing and impact indicators allow for easy inspection. They feature 5-point adjustments for optimal fit, lightweight hardware and pads, and bright colors for worker visibility on the jobsite. The back pad is large enough to protect the user's back, padded to absorb sweat and feel comfortable, and designed to prevent tangling when donning the harness. Made for general construction, these harnesses are designed for tool carrying capabilities with a removable body belt. Quick connect chest and leg buckles for fast and easy connections.

small_image_label: Blue Armor 2000 H1230 Climbing (2 D Rings) Harness
thumbnail_label: Blue Armor 2000 H1230 Climbing (2 D Rings) Harness
description: Werner Blue Armor 2000 harnesses are designed and manufactured for the most demanding applications and the most serious professional user.
short_description:
Features:
  • 5-point adjustments for optimal fit
  • Chest D-ring for climbing applications
  • Large back pad with breathable, sweat absorbing foam helps keep harness untangled when donning
  • Quick connect buckles on chest and legs for fast, easy connections
  • Shoulder pads for user comfort
  • WebAlert inspectable webbing makes wear and damage visible and obvious, and with multiple impact ind
summary:
Werner Blue Armor 2000 harnesses are designed and manufactured for the most demanding applications and the most serious professional user. Unique wear indicating webbing and impact indicators allow for easy inspection. They feature 5-point adjustments for optimal fit, lightweight hardware and pads, and bright colors for worker visibility on the jobsite. The back pad is large enough to protect the user's back, padded to absorb sweat and feel comfortable, and designed to prevent tangling when donning the harness. Shoulder pads provide additional user comfort. The rear dorsal D-ring is made from high quality forged alloy steel for strength and durability. Chest D-ring for climbing applications. Quick connect chest and leg buckles for fast and easy connections.


Specifications
  • Back D-Ring: Yes
  • Back Padding: Yes
  • Belt: None
  • Chest Strap Buckle: quick connect
  • Family: BlueArmor2000
  • Front D-Ring: Yes
  • Good/Better/Best: Best
  • Inspectable Webbing: Yes
  • Lanyard Keeper: Yes
  • Leg Strap Buckles: quick connect
  • Seat Sling: No
  • Shoulder D-Rings: No
  • Shoulder Padding: Yes
  • Side D-Rings: No
  • Style: Climbing (2 D Rings)
meta_keyword: Blue Armor 2000 H1230 Climbing (2 D Rings) Harness

  • Quick connect buckles on chest
  • Shoulder D-rings for confined space and retrieval applications
  • Shoulder pads for user comfort
  • Tongue buckle legs straps, ideal when multiple workers use the same harness
  • WebAlert inspectable webbing makes wear and damage visible and obvious, and with multiple impact ind

Shoulder D-rings for confined space and retrieval applications. Quick connect chest buckle. Tongue buckle leg straps are simple, fast, easy, and ideal when more than one worker could use the same harness.

description: Blue Armor 1000 H2110 Standard (1 D Ring) Harness
short_description:
Features:
  • 5-point adjustments for optimal fit
  • Large back pad with breathable, sweat absorbing foam helps keep harness untangled when donning
  • Slotted pass through buckles on the chest and leg straps fasten without twisting
  • WebAlert inspectable webbing makes wear and damage visible and obvious, and with multiple impact ind
summary:
Werner Blue Armor 1000 harnesses deliver the right combination of safety features, comfort, and durability for the professional worker. Unique wear indicating webbing and impact indicators allow for easy inspection. They feature 5-point adjustments for optimal fit, lightweight hardware and pads, and bright colors for worker visibility on the jobsite. The back pad is large enough to protect the user's back, padded to absorb sweat and feel comfortable, and designed to prevent tangling when donning the harness. The rear dorsal D-ring is made from high quality forged alloy steel for strength and durability. Slotted pass-through buckles on the leg and chest straps fasten without twisting.

name: 6' DeCoil Lanyard (DCELL Shock Pack, 1" Web, Snaphooks)
meta_title: 6' DeCoil Lanyard (DCELL Shock Pack, 1" Web, Snaphooks)
meta_description: Werner DeCoil lanyards feature the DCELL Shock Pack, a deceleration device designed for controlled tearing action to reduce fall arrest force. Unique wear indicating polyester webbing allows for easy inspection and provides durability that will last. T
small_image_label: 6' DeCoil Lanyard (DCELL Shock Pack, 1" Web, Snaphooks)
thumbnail_label: 6' DeCoil Lanyard (DCELL Shock Pack, 1" Web, Snaphooks)
description: Werner DeCoil lanyards feature the DCELL Shock Pack, a deceleration device designed for controlled tearing action to reduce fall arrest force. Unique wear indicating polyester webbing allows for easy inspection and provides durability that will last. The BigHead Safety Hook is designed to prevent false engagement.
short_description:
Features:
  • Werner DCELL Shock Pack is a deceleration device designed for controlled tearing action to reduce fall arrest forces on the user.
  • WebAlert inspectable polyester webbing makes wear and damage visible and obvious, making inspection easier, while providing durability that will last.
  • BigHead Safety Hook is designed to prevent false engagement when connecting to the user's harness
summary:
• Family: DeCoil
  • Style: Shock Pack Energy Absorbing (non-elastic)
  • Energy Absorber Type: Shock Pack
  • Legs: Single Leg
  • Options: None
  • Material: Web
  • Harness Connection: Hook
  • Anchorage Connector: 3/4" Standard Snap Hook
  • Length: 6'
  • WebAlert Inspectable Webbing: Yes
  • Impact Indicator: Yes

name: Blue Armor 1000 H2310 Positioning (3 D Rings) Harness
Group_Name: Blue Armor 1000 H2310 Positioning (3 D Rings) Harness
meta_title: Blue Armor 1000 H2310 Positioning (3 D Rings) Harness
meta_description: Werner Blue Armor 1000 harnesses deliver the right combination of safety features, comfort, and durability for the professional worker.
small_image_label: Blue Armor 1000 H2310 Positioning (3 D Rings) Harness
thumbnail_label: Blue Armor 1000 H2310 Positioning (3 D Rings) Harness
description: Werner Blue Armor 1000 harnesses deliver the right combination of safety features, comfort, and durability for the professional worker.
short_description:
Features:
  • 5-point adjustments for optimal fit
  • Hip D-rings for positioning applications
  • Large back pad with breathable, sweat absorbing foam helps keep harness untangled when donning
  • Slotted pass through buckles on the chest and leg straps fasten without twisting
  • WebAlert inspectable webbing makes wear and damage visible and obvious, and with multiple impact ind
summary:
Werner Blue Armor 1000 harnesses deliver the right combination of safety features, comfort, and durability for the professional worker. Unique wear indicating webbing and impact indicators allow for easy inspection. They feature 5-point adjustments for optimal fit, lightweight hardware and pads, and bright colors for worker visibility on the jobsite. The back pad is large enough to protect the user's back, padded to absorb sweat and feel comfortable, and designed to prevent tangling when donning the harness. The rear dorsal D-ring is made from high quality forged alloy steel for strength and durability. Hip D-rings for positioning applications. Slotted pass-through buckles on the leg and chest straps fasten without twisting.


Specifications

description: Blue Armor 1000 H2320 Positioning (3 D Rings) Harness
short_description:
Features:
  • 5-point adjustments for optimal fit
  • Hip D-rings for positioning applications
  • Large back pad with breathable, sweat absorbing foam helps keep harness untangled when donning
  • Slotted pass through buckles on the chest strap fastens without twisting
  • Tongue buckle legs straps, ideal when multiple workers use the same harness
  • WebAlert inspectable webbing makes wear and damage visible and obvious, and with multiple impact ind
summary:
Werner Blue Armor 1000 harnesses deliver the right combination of safety features, comfort, and durability for the professional worker. Unique wear indicating webbing and impact indicators allow for easy inspection. They feature 5-point adjustments for optimal fit, lightweight hardware and pads, and bright colors for worker visibility on the jobsite. The back pad is large enough to protect the user's back, padded to absorb sweat and feel comfortable, and designed to prevent tangling when donning the harness. The rear dorsal D-ring is made from high quality forged alloy steel for strength and durability. Hip D-rings for positioning applications. Slotted pass-through buckle on the chest strap and tongue buckle leg straps are simple, fast, easy, and ideal when more than one worker could use the same harness.


Specifications
  • Back D-Ring: Yes
  • Back Padding: Yes
  • Belt: None
  • Chest Strap Buckle: slotted pass-thru
  • Family: BlueArmor1000
  • Front D-Ring: No
  • Good/Better/Best: Better
  • Inspectable Webbing: Yes
  • Lanyard Keeper: Yes
  • Leg Strap Buckles: tongue buckle
  • Seat Sling: No
  • Shoulder D-Rings: No
  • Shoulder Padding: No
  • Side D-Rings: Yes
  • Style: Positioning (3 D Rings)
meta_keyword: Blue Armor 1000 H2320 Positioning (3 D Rings) Harness

meta_description: Werner Blue Armor 1000 harnesses deliver the right combination of safety features, comfort, and durability for the professional worker.
small_image_label: Blue Armor 1000 H2410 Retrieval (3 D Rings) Harness
thumbnail_label: Blue Armor 1000 H2410 Retrieval (3 D Rings) Harness
description: Blue Armor 1000 H2410 Retrieval (3 D Rings) Harness
short_description:
Features:
  • 5-point adjustments for optimal fit
  • Large back pad with breathable, sweat absorbing foam helps keep harness untangled when donning
  • Shoulder D-rings for confined space and retrieval applications
  • Slotted pass through buckles on the chest and leg straps fasten without twisting
  • WebAlert inspectable webbing makes wear and damage visible and obvious, and with multiple impact ind
summary:
Werner Blue Armor 1000 harnesses deliver the right combination of safety features, comfort, and durability for the professional worker. Unique wear indicating webbing and impact indicators allow for easy inspection. They feature 5-point adjustments for optimal fit, lightweight hardware and pads, and bright colors for worker visibility on the jobsite. The back pad is large enough to protect the user's back, padded to absorb sweat and feel comfortable, and designed to prevent tangling when donning the harness. The rear dorsal D-ring is made from high quality forged alloy steel for strength and durability. Shoulder D-rings for confined space and retrieval applications. Slotted pass-through buckles on the leg and chest straps fasten without twisting.


Specifications
  • Back D-Ring: Yes
  • Back Padding: Yes
  • Belt: None
  • Chest Strap Buckle: slotted pass-thru
  • Family: BlueArmor1000
  • Front D-Ring: Yes

small_image_label: 6' DeCoil Cable Tie-Back Single Leg Lanyard
thumbnail_label: 6' DeCoil Cable Tie-Back Single Leg Lanyard
description: Werner DeCoil lanyards feature the DCELL Shock Pack, a deceleration device designed for controlled tearing action to reduce fall arrest force. The BigHead Safety Hook is designed to prevent false engagement. Vinyl coated 1/4" cable is heat and abrasion resistant.
short_description:
Features:
  • Werner DCELL Shock Pack is a deceleration device designed for controlled tearing action to reduce fall arrest forces on the user.
  • BigHead Safety Hook is designed to prevent false engagement when connecting to the user's harness.
  • Vinyl coated 1/4" cable is heat resistant and highly abrasion resistant.
  • DCELL Shock Pack, 5/16" Vinyl Coated Cable, Snaphook.
summary:
• Family: DeCoil
  • Style: Shock Pack Energy Absorbing (non-elastic)

  • Material: Cable
  • Harness Connection: Hook
  • Anchorage Connector: 3/4" Standard Snap Hook
  • Length: 6'
  • WebAlert Inspectable Webbing: No
  • Impact Indicator: Yes

Group_Name: Blue Armor 1000 H2620 Climbing/Positioning (4 D Rings) Harness
meta_title: Blue Armor 1000 H2620 Climbing/Positioning (4 D Rings) Harness
meta_description: Werner Blue Armor 1000 harnesses deliver the right combination of safety features, comfort, and durability for the professional worker.
small_image_label: Blue Armor 1000 H2620 Climbing/Positioning (4 D Rings) Harness
thumbnail_label: Blue Armor 1000 H2620 Climbing/Positioning (4 D Rings) Harness
description: Blue Armor 1000 H2620 Climbing/Positioning (4 D Rings) Harness
short_description:
Features:
  • 5-point adjustments for optimal fit
  • Chest D-ring for climbing applications
  • Hip D-rings for positioning applications
  • Large back pad with breathable, sweat absorbing foam helps keep harness untangled when donning
  • Slotted pass through buckles on the chest strap fastens without twisting
  • Tongue buckle legs straps, ideal when multiple workers use the same harness
  • WebAlert inspectable webbing makes wear and damage visible and obvious, and with multiple impact ind
summary:
Werner Blue Armor 1000 harnesses deliver the right combination of safety features, comfort, and durability for the professional worker. Unique wear indicating webbing and impact indicators allow for easy inspection. They feature 5-point adjustments for optimal fit, lightweight hardware and pads, and bright colors for worker visibility on the jobsite. The back pad is large enough to protect the user's back, padded to absorb sweat and feel comfortable, and designed to prevent tangling when donning the harness. The rear dorsal D-ring is made from high quality forged alloy steel for strength and durability. Hip D-rings for positioning, chest D-ring for climbing applications. Slotted pass-through buckle on the chest strap and tongue buckle leg straps are simple, fast, easy, and ideal when more than one worker could use the same harness.


Specifications
  • Back D-Ring: Yes
  • Back Padding: Yes
  • Belt: None
  • Chest Strap Buckle: slotted pass-thru
  • Family: BlueArmor1000
  • Front D-Ring: No
  • Good/Better/Best: Better
  • Inspectable Webbing: Yes
  • Lanyard Keeper: Yes
  • Leg Strap Buckles: tongue buckle
  • Seat Sling: No
  • Shoulder D-Rings: No
  • Shoulder Padding: No
  • Side D-Rings: Yes
  • Style: Climbing/Positioning (4 D Rings)
meta_keyword: Blue Armor 1000 H2620 Climbing/Positioning (4 D Rings) Harness

  • BigHead Safety Hook is designed to prevent false engagement when connecting to the user's harness.

name: 6' DeCoil Adjustable Twinleg Lanyard
meta_title: 6' DeCoil Adjustable Twinleg Lanyard
meta_description: Werner DeCoil lanyards feature the DCELL Shock Pack, a deceleration device designed for controlled tearing action to reduce fall arrest force. Unique wear indicating polyester webbing allows for easy inspection and provides durability that will last. T
small_image_label: 6' DeCoil Adjustable Twinleg Lanyard
thumbnail_label: 6' DeCoil Adjustable Twinleg Lanyard
description: Werner DeCoil lanyards feature the DCELL Shock Pack, a deceleration device designed for controlled tearing action to reduce fall arrest force. Unique wear indicating polyester webbing allows for easy inspection and provides durability that will last. The BigHead Safety Hook is designed to prevent false engagement. Adjustable length allows user to customize the lanyard for their job. Twin leg design for 100% tie-off, allowing the user to safely move from one location to another.
short_description:
Features:
  • Werner DCELL Shock Pack is a deceleration device designed for controlled tearing action to reduce fall arrest forces on the user.
  • WebAlert inspectable polyester webbing makes wear and damage visible and obvious, making inspection easier, while providing durability that will last.
  • BigHead Safety Hook is designed to prevent false engagement when connecting to the user's harness.
  • Adjustable length to fit your job.
  • Twin leg design for 100% tie-off, allowing the user to safely move from one location to another
summary:
• Family: DeCoil
  • Style: Shock Pack Energy Absorbing (non-elastic)
  • Energy Absorber Type: Shock Pack
  • Legs: Dual Leg
  • Options: Adjustable
  • Material: Web
  • Harness Connection: Hook
  • Anchorage Connector: 2-1/2" Ladder Snap Hook
  • Length: 6'
  • WebAlert Inspectable Webbing: Yes
  • Impact Indicator: Yes
meta_keyword: 6' DeCoil Adjustable Twinleg Lanyard

name: LiteFit H3620 Climbing/Positioning (4 D Rings) Harness
Group_Name: LiteFit H3620 Climbing/Positioning (4 D Rings) Harness
meta_title: LiteFit H3620 Climbing/Positioning (4 D Rings) Harness
meta_description: The Werner LiteFit line provides the right harness, the right fit, and the right value.
small_image_label: LiteFit H3620 Climbing/Positioning (4 D Rings) Harness
thumbnail_label: LiteFit H3620 Climbing/Positioning (4 D Rings) Harness
description: The Werner LiteFit line provides the right harness, the right fit, and the right value.
short_description:
Features:
  • 5-point adjustments for optimal fit
  • Chest D-ring for climbing applications
  • Hip D-rings for positioning applications
  • Multiple impact indicators make inspection easier
  • Sliding back D-ring for adjustability
  • Slotted pass through buckles on the chest strap fastens without twisting
  • Tongue buckle legs straps, ideal when multiple workers use the same harness
summary:
The Werner LiteFit line provides the right harness, the right fit, and the right value. Their design allows for 5-point adjustments for optimal fit, lightweight hardware and pads, and bright colors for worker visibility on the jobsite. Rear dorsal D-ring is made from high quality alloy steel for strength and durability, and has an adjustable pad for worker convenience and fit. Hip D-rings for positioning, chest D-ring for climbing applications. Slotted pass-through buckle on the chest strap and tongue buckle leg straps are simple, fast, easy, and ideal when more than one worker could use the same harness.


Specifications
  • Back D-Ring: Yes
  • Back Padding: No
  • Belt: None
  • Chest Strap Buckle: slotted pass-thru
  • Family: LiteFit
  • Front D-Ring: No
  • Good/Better/Best: Good
  • Inspectable Webbing: No
  • Lanyard Keeper: Yes
  • Leg Strap Buckles: tongue buckle
  • Seat Sling: No
  • Shoulder D-Rings: No
  • Shoulder Padding: No
  • Side D-Rings: Yes
  • Style: Climbing/Positioning (4 D Rings)
meta_keyword: LiteFit H3620 Climbing/Positioning (4 D Rings) Harness

Unique wear indicating polyester webbing allows for easy inspection and provides durability that will last. Twin leg design for 100% tie-off, allowing the user to safely move from one location to another.

Features:
  • Werner DCELL Shock Pack is a deceleration device designed for controlled tearing action to reduce fall arrest forces on the user.
  • WebAlert inspectable polyester webbing makes wear and damage visible and obvious, making inspection easier, while providing durability that will last.
  • Twin leg design for 100% tie-off, allowing the user to safely move from one location to another.
  • DCELL Shock Pack, 1" Web, Loop, Snaphook

name: K111101 Roofing Kit, 30' Basic
meta_title: K111101 Roofing Kit, 30' Basic
meta_description: Werner roofing kits contain all of the fall protection products necessary for safe working and code compliance for roofing applications.
small_image_label: K111101 Roofing Kit, 30' Basic
thumbnail_label: K111101 Roofing Kit, 30' Basic
description: Werner roofing kits contain all of the fall protection products necessary for safe working and code compliance for roofing applications.
short_description:
Features:
  • Contains all of the necessary products for safety and fall protection code compliance
  • Easy to install and use on a range of roof pitches
  • Includes Litefit harness with pass-through buckle leg straps, reusable roof anchor, 50' poly-dac rope, and a manual rope grab with an integrated 3' shock absorbing lanyard
  • Packaged in waterproof bucket
summary:
Werner roofing kits contain all of the fall protection products necessary for safe working and code compliance for roofing applications. The system is easy to install and use on a variety of roof pitches. Kit includes a Litefit harness with pass-through buckle leg straps, reusable roof anchor, 30' poly-dac rope, and a manual rope grab with an integrated 3' shock absorbing lanyard, packaged in a waterproof bucket.


Kit Contents
  • A210400: A210400 Plated Steel Roof Anchor with D-Ring
  • H311002: LiteFit H311002 Standard (1 D Ring) Harness - Medium/Large
  • L201030: L201030 30' 5/8" Poly-dac Vertical Lifeline
  • L210101: L210101 3' Manual Rope Adjuster with Shock Absorbing Lanyard for 5/8" Rope

Specifications
  • Style: Roofing
  • Container: Bucket
  • Lifeline Length: 30
  • Harness Leg Strap Buckle Type: Slotted Pass-Thru
  • Contents: A210400, L201030, L210101, H311002
meta_keyword: K111101 Roofing Kit, 30' Basic

name: MT-26 26' Type IA Telescoping MultiLadder
meta_title: MT-26 26' Type IA Telescoping MultiLadder
small_image_label: MT-26 26' Type IA Telescoping MultiLadder
thumbnail_label: MT-26 26' Type IA Telescoping MultiLadder
description: The MT series Telescoping MultiLadders are versatile and easy to transport.
short_description:
Features:
  • Smooth curved rails for comfortable climbing
  • Easily converts to: 1. Twin Stepladder 2.Stairway stepladder 3. Extension ladder 4. 2-Scaffold bases
  • Double riveted steps for long lasting durability
  • Extra wide flared bottom for firm support
  • Slip-resistant feet
  • Telescoping design for maximum versatility
  • Designed for one or two person jobs
summary:
The MT series Telescoping MultiLadders are versatile and easy to transport. The telescoping design allows the ladder to be used in 4 different positions -- twin stepladder, stairway stepladder, extension ladder and as 2 scaffold bases. In the stepladder mode, the multiladder can be used for one or two-person jobs with a duty rating of 300 pounds per side. The feet are slip resistant and the ends of the ladder are flared for firm support. Smooth curved rails allow for comfortable climbing. With its many uses, this ladder may fit all your climbing needs.

The MT series Telescoping MultiLadders are versatile and easy to transport. The telescoping design allows the ladder to be used in 4 different positions -- twin stepladder, stairway stepladder, extension ladder and as 2 scaffold bases. In the stepladder mode, the multiladder can be used for one or two-person jobs with a duty rating of 300 pounds per side. The feet are slip resistant and the ends of the ladder are flared for firm support. Smooth curved rails allow for comfortable climbing. With its many uses, this ladder may fit all your climbing needs.

small_image_label: 4' Portable Scaffold
thumbnail_label: 4' Portable Scaffold
description: The PS-48 Portable Scaffold is a versatile, portable 4' scaffold that can be used as a push cart, working scaffold, storage shelf or work bench. Contains two planks (one 10", one 6" deep), with combined 500 lbs. load capacity (250 lbs per plank). Planks adjust to different working heights of 12", 24" or 36". Non-marring wheels prevent damage to floor by securely locking into place. Multi-use S-hooks make transportation easy and are ToolLasso® ready.
short_description:

  • Multi-use S-hooks make transportation easy and are toollasso ready.
  • Extra wide 10" plank for secure standing and comfort.
  • Versatile; can be used as push cart, storage shelf or work bench.
  • Planks adjust to different standing heights.
  • 250 lbs. per plank (500 lbs. combined)

name: 6' SoftCoil Single Leg Lanyard

meta_description: Werner SoftCoil lanyards feature an energy absorbing inner core that uses the entire length of the lanyard to absorb the energy of a fall and reduce the arresting forces on a user. An integrated impact indicator provides obvious warning to the user whe
small_image_label: 6' SoftCoil Single Leg Lanyard
thumbnail_label: 6' SoftCoil Single Leg Lanyard
description: Werner SoftCoil lanyards feature an energy absorbing inner core that uses the entire length of the lanyard to absorb the energy of a fall and reduce the arresting forces on a user. An integrated impact indicator provides obvious warning to the user when the lanyard has been in a fall. The BigHead Safety Hook is designed to prevent false engagement.
short_description:
Features:
  • The Werner SofCoil lanyard's specially designed inner core absorbs fall arrest energy along the entire length of the lanyard.
  • Integrated impact indicator gives user clear visual warning when the lanyard has been subjected to a fall and should be removed from service.
  • The BigHead Safety Hook is designed to prevent false engagement.

meta_title: ESC330 3-Story Built-In Fire Escape Ladder
meta_description: The ESC series is a built-in fire escape ladder that installs permanently under a window making it always there if ever needed. Deploys in seconds for a quick escape.

thumbnail_label: ESC330 3-Story Built-In Fire Escape Ladder
description: The ESC series is a built-in fire escape ladder that installs permanently under a window making it always there if ever needed. Deploys in seconds for a quick escape.
short_description:
Features:
  • Blends with room decor
  • Storage pan permanently installs in wall
  • Climbing assistance strap
  • Anti-slip rungs and standoffs
  • Door included with unit
  • Permanent installation always there when you need it
  • Deploys in seconds easy to use
  • Faster escape supports up to 1200 lbs
summary:
Performance Overview
SizeLoad Capacity
24' 8"1200 lbs.

The ESC series is a built-in fire escape ladder that installs permanently under a window making it always there if ever needed. Deploys in seconds for a quick escape. Supports up to 1200 pounds and is easy to use. The rungs are anti-slip and have standoffs for ease in descending. The climbing assist strap aids in exiting the window. EVERY SECOND COUNTS, ESCAPE FASTER.

name: T7412 12' Type IAA Fiberglass Twin Ladder
meta_title: T7412 12' Type IAA Fiberglass Twin Ladder
meta_description: Werner T7400 twin stepladders feature a duty rating of 375 pounds per side of the ladder. Designed for one or two-person jobs, the T7400 ladders have heavy gauge aluminum tops and feature heavy duty internal spreaders to resist damage around the worksite
small_image_label: T7412 12' Type IAA Fiberglass Twin Ladder
thumbnail_label: T7412 12' Type IAA Fiberglass Twin Ladder
description: Werner T7400 twin stepladders feature a duty rating of 375 pounds per side of the ladder. Designed for one or two-person jobs, the T7400 ladders have heavy gauge aluminum tops and feature heavy duty internal spreaders to resist damage around the worksite or in transit. The GLAS*MARK® Violater stripes on the rails make the ladder more visible and the EDGE® bracing system and external rail shields add to the long lasting durability of these ladders. Fiberglass rails are non-conductive for working near electricity.
short_description:
"Performance Overview "
StyleSizeReach HeightLoad CapacityType
Twin10'14'375 lbs.Type IAA Duty Rating

Features include:

  • Heavy gauge aluminum extruded top with thick side plates
  • Back-up aluminum plates reinforce all top connectors
  • Shoulder bolt and lock nut on top hinge; 4 solid aluminum rivets attach top to each rail
  • Slip-resistant TRACTION-TRED® steps are double riveted and knee-braced
  • Extra heavy duty internal aluminum spreaders
  • Rubber step bumpers to resist damage
  • The EDGE® bracing system helps to decrease damage to rail
  • Glas*Mark® Violator stripes on rails allow ladder to be more visible
  • Aluminum external rail shield helps protect against abrasion damage
  • Shoe pads riveted to the EDGE® structure
  • Every rivet backed up by metal, metal plates or washer to protect rails
  • Design for one or two-person jobs
  • Maximum load per side, including person and materials, shall not exceed duty rating of ladder

name: T7410 10' Type IAA Fiberglass Twin Ladder
meta_title: T7410 10' Type IAA Fiberglass Twin Ladder
meta_description: Werner T7400 twin stepladders feature a duty rating of 375 pounds per side of the ladder. Designed for one or two-person jobs, the T7400 ladders have heavy gauge aluminum tops and feature heavy duty internal spreaders to resist damage around the worksite
small_image_label: T7410 10' Type IAA Fiberglass Twin Ladder
thumbnail_label: T7410 10' Type IAA Fiberglass Twin Ladder
description: Werner T7400 twin stepladders feature a duty rating of 375 pounds per side of the ladder. Designed for one or two-person jobs, the T7400 ladders have heavy gauge aluminum tops and feature heavy duty internal spreaders to resist damage around the worksite or in transit. The GLAS*MARK® Violater stripes on the rails make the ladder more visible and the EDGE® bracing system and external rail shields add to the long lasting durability of these ladders. Fiberglass rails are non-conductive for working near electricity.
short_description:
"Performance Overview "
StyleSizeReach HeightLoad CapacityType
Twin10'14'375 lbs.Type IAA Duty Rating

Features include:

  • Heavy gauge aluminum extruded top with thick side plates
  • Back-up aluminum plates reinforce all top connectors
  • Shoulder bolt and lock nut on top hinge; 4 solid aluminum rivets attach top to each rail
  • Slip-resistant TRACTION-TRED® steps are double riveted and knee-braced
  • Extra heavy duty internal aluminum spreaders
  • Rubber step bumpers to resist damage
  • The EDGE® bracing system helps to decrease damage to rail
  • Glas*Mark® Violator stripes on rails allow ladder to be more visible
  • Aluminum external rail shield helps protect against abrasion damage
  • Shoe pads riveted to the EDGE® structure
  • Every rivet backed up by metal, metal plates or washer to protect rails
  • Design for one or two-person jobs
  • Maximum load per side, including person and materials, shall not exceed duty rating of ladder

name: PA210 10'-17' Aluminum Extension Plank
meta_title: PA210 10'-17' Aluminum Extension Plank
meta_description: The PA200 series Aluminum Extension Planks are ideal for use on stepladders, telescoping multiladders, extension trestle ladders and extension and single straight ladders equipped with ladder jacks.
small_image_label: PA210 10'-17' Aluminum Extension Plank
thumbnail_label: PA210 10'-17' Aluminum Extension Plank
description: The PA200 series Aluminum Extension Planks are ideal for use on stepladders, telescoping multiladders, extension trestle ladders and extension and single straight ladders equipped with ladder jacks.
short_description:
Features:
  • For use on stepladders, telescoping multiladders, extension trestle ladders and extension and single ladders equipped with ladder jacks
  • Made of 2" deep box section extrusions
  • Extruded cross member riveted with solid aluminum rivets
  • Positive stops prevent over-extending
  • Molded thermo-plastic spacer guides for easy open/close action
  • Outer flange open for ladder jack clamps
  • Locking mechanism sets the plank in 12" increments
  • Heavy End Flange/Handles For Rigidity And Ease Of Operation
summary:
Performance Overview
Side Rail LengthApprox. WidthLoad Capacity
10' to 17'14"250 lbs.

The PA200 series Aluminum Extension Planks are ideal for use on stepladders, telescoping multiladders, extension trestle ladders and extension and single straight ladders equipped with ladder jacks. Positive stops on the plank prevent overextending. Molded thermo-plastic spacer guides allow for easy open/close action. Made of 2" deep box section extrusions. Heavy end flange/handles for rigidity and ease of operation. Outer flange is open for ladder jack clamps. The extruded cross members are riveted with solid aluminum rivets. Locking mechanism sets the plank in 12" increments. 250 pound load capacity.

name: 7412 12' Type IAA Fiberglass Step Ladder
meta_title: 7412 12' Type IAA Fiberglass Step Ladder
meta_description: Built to last, the Werner 375-pound duty rated 7400 ladders are rugged and ready for the job. These ladders feature extra heavy duty aluminum HolsterTop®s, internal spreaders and external rail shields for long lasting durability. With the EDGE® bracing sy
small_image_label: 7412 12' Type IAA Fiberglass Step Ladder
thumbnail_label: 7412 12' Type IAA Fiberglass Step Ladder
description: Built to last, the Werner 375-pound duty rated 7400 ladders are rugged and ready for the job. These ladders feature extra heavy duty aluminum HolsterTop®s, internal spreaders and external rail shields for long lasting durability. With the EDGE® bracing system and GLAS*MARK® Violator stripes on the rails, the 7400 series is built to handle the worksite and stands ready for tough jobs. Fiberglass rails are non-conductive for working near electricity.
short_description:
"Performance Overview "
StyleSizeReach HeightLoad CapacityType
Single Sided12'16'375 lbs.Type IAA Duty Rating

Features include:

  • Extra heavy duty aluminum HolsterTop® with thick side plates
  • Back-up plates reinforce all top connectors
  • Shoulder bolt and lock nut on top hinge; 4 solid aluminum rivets attach top to each front rail
  • Slip-resistant TRACTION-TRED® steps are double riveted and have extra wide knee braces
  • Full set of rear horizontals are knee braced and spaced one per foot
  • Extra heavy duty internal aluminum spreaders
  • Aluminum external rail shield helps protect against abrasion damage
  • Glas*Mark® Violator stripes on rails allow ladder to be more visible
  • Slip-resistant foot pads attached to the EDGE® structure
  • The EDGE® bracing system helps to decrease damage to rail
  • Every rivet backed up by metal, metal plates or washers to protect rails
  • Optional manual pail shelf kit, model no. PK76-9 or automatic closing pail shelf kit model no. 76-2

The large work platform provides a secure and comfortable work area while the EDGE bracing system and external rails shields add to the durability of the product. The safety guard rail at the top of the ladder encourages proper ladder use. Fiberglass rails are non-conductive for working near electricity.

description: The Old Blue Series Electrician's ladder is not your ordinary stepladder -- it's a Jobstation™. These Jobstations™ save time and increase productivity on the job. With a duty rating of 375 pounds, the Old Blue series features customized HolsterTops with ToolLasso sockets to accommodate even more tools. Wire spool holders for both large and small spools and conduit holders with a built-in cutting system make these ladders ideal for electricians. The EDGE bracing system helps to decrease damage to the rail. Fiberglass rails are non-conductive.

thumbnail_label: 7310 10' Type IAA Fiberglass Step Ladder
description: Werner 7300 stepladders have a duty rating of 375 pounds and feature heavy duty aluminum HolsterTops. With a full set of horizontals and heavy duty internal spreaders, these ladders are built for the long haul. The molded external rail shields and EDGE bracing system help decrease damage to the rails. The slip-resistant TRACTION-TRED steps are single riveted and have extra wide knee braces. The GLAS*MARK Violator stripes increase the visibility of the ladder on the jobsite. Fiberglass rails are non-conductive for working near electricity.

name: 32' Type IAA Fiberglass D-Rung Leveling Extension Ladder
meta_title: 32' Type IAA Fiberglass D-Rung Leveling Extension Ladder
meta_description: The D7100-2LV series extension ladders boast a duty rating of 375 pounds and have factory-installed LeveLok levelers to enable the ladders to adapt to uneven terrain.
small_image_label: 32' Type IAA Fiberglass D-Rung Leveling Extension Ladder
thumbnail_label: 32' Type IAA Fiberglass D-Rung Leveling Extension Ladder
description: The D7100-2LV series extension ladders boast a duty rating of 375 pounds and have factory-installed LeveLok levelers to enable the ladders to adapt to uneven terrain.
short_description:
Features:
  • Ideal for utility and telecommunication industries
  • LeveLok is a registered trademark of the LeveLok Corporation.
  • Factory installed LeveLok Leveler enables ladder to adapt to uneven terrain
  • With simple foot action, Leveler extends up to 10” in 3/16” increments
  • Exclusive ALFLO Rung Joint Means TWIST-PROOF Performance
  • 1-5/8" Slip-resistant TRACTION-TRED D-rungs
  • Plate and rung assembly are riveted at four points to each side rail to allow for rung replacement
  • Interlocking Side Rails with nylon coated internal rail guides on bottom of fly section increase ease of operation
  • External guides at top of base secton securely interlock rails
  • Rugged gravity spring locks operate smoothly
  • Base and fly separate easily to use base section as single ladder
  • Rugged, heavy duty extruded rung locks are spring loaded to operate smoothly
  • Pre-pierced holes for easy field installation of accessories
  • Dual action feet with slip-resistant pad and spur plate for use on hard or penetrable surfaces
  • Mar-Resistant Molded End Caps
summary:
The D7100-2LV series extension ladders boast a duty rating of 375 pounds and have factory-installed LeveLok levelers to enable the ladders to adapt to uneven terrain. With simple foot action, each leveler can extend up to 10" in 3/16" increments. These ladders are ideal for utility or telecommunication industries. The external guides at the top of the base section secure the interlocking rails. The top of the fly section has pre-pierced holes for easy installation of accessories. The base and fly sections easily separate to use the base section as a single ladder. Fiberglass rails are non-conductive for working near electricity. (36' & 40' do not have interlocking rails)

name: 28' Type IAA Fiberglass D-Rung Leveling Extension Ladder
meta_title: 28' Type IAA Fiberglass D-Rung Leveling Extension Ladder
meta_description: The D7100-2LV series extension ladders boast a duty rating of 375 pounds and have factory-installed LeveLok levelers to enable the ladders to adapt to uneven terrain.
small_image_label: 28' Type IAA Fiberglass D-Rung Leveling Extension Ladder
thumbnail_label: 28' Type IAA Fiberglass D-Rung Leveling Extension Ladder
description: The D7100-2LV series extension ladders boast a duty rating of 375 pounds and have factory-installed LeveLok levelers to enable the ladders to adapt to uneven terrain.
short_description:
Features
  • Factory installed LeveLok Leveler enables ladder to adapt to uneven terrain
  • With simple foot action, Leveler extends up to 10” in 3/16” increments
  • Exclusive ALFLO Rung Joint Means TWIST-PROOF Performance
  • 1-5/8" Slip-resistant TRACTION-TRED D-rungs
  • Plate and rung assembly are riveted at four points to each side rail to allow for rung replacement
  • Interlocking Side Rails with nylon coated internal rail guides on bottom of fly section increase ease of operation
  • External guides at top of base secton securely interlock rails
  • Rugged gravity spring locks operate smoothly
  • Base and fly separate easily to use base section as single ladder
  • Rugged, heavy duty extruded rung locks are spring loaded to operate smoothly
  • Pre-pierced holes for easy field installation of accessories
  • Dual action feet with slip-resistant pad and spur plate for use on hard or penetrable surfaces
  • Mar-Resistant Molded End Caps
  • Ideal for utility and telecommunication industries
  • LeveLok is a registered trademark of the LeveLok Corporation.
summary:
The D7100-2LV series extension ladders boast a duty rating of 375 pounds and have factory-installed LeveLok levelers to enable the ladders to adapt to uneven terrain. With simple foot action, each leveler can extend up to 10" in 3/16" increments. These ladders are ideal for utility or telecommunication industries. The external guides at the top of the base section secure the interlocking rails. The top of the fly section has pre-pierced holes for easy installation of accessories. The base and fly sections easily separate to use the base section as a single ladder. Fiberglass rails are non-conductive for working near electricity. (36' & 40' do not have interlocking rails).

summary:
The D500-2 aluminum extension ladders have a duty rating of 375 pounds and feature the exclusive ALFLO rung joint for a TWIST-PROOF performance every time. The end caps are mar resistant and notched for easy separation of sections. Both the base and the fly sections can be used separately. Internal guides increase the ease of operation when raising and lowering. The feet are heavy-duty, self-aligning and free swinging for hard or penetrable surfaces. Rugged spring-loaded locks operate smoothly. TRACTION-TRED D rungs are slip resistant. Duty rating changes to 300 pounds for 36'-48' models.

name: 24' Type IAA Fiberglass D-Rung Leveling Extension Ladder
meta_title: 24' Type IAA Fiberglass D-Rung Leveling Extension Ladder
meta_description: The D7100-2LV series extension ladders boast a duty rating of 375 pounds and have factory-installed LeveLok levelers to enable the ladders to adapt to uneven terrain.
small_image_label: 24' Type IAA Fiberglass D-Rung Leveling Extension Ladder
thumbnail_label: 24' Type IAA Fiberglass D-Rung Leveling Extension Ladder
description: The D7100-2LV series extension ladders boast a duty rating of 375 pounds and have factory-installed LeveLok levelers to enable the ladders to adapt to uneven terrain.
short_description:
Features:
  • Factory installed LeveLok Leveler enables ladder to adapt to uneven terrain
  • With simple foot action, Leveler extends up to 10” in 3/16” increments
  • Exclusive ALFLO Rung Joint Means TWIST-PROOF Performance
  • 1-5/8" Slip-resistant TRACTION-TRED D-rungs
  • Plate and rung assembly are riveted at four points to each side rail to allow for rung replacement
  • Interlocking Side Rails with nylon coated internal rail guides on bottom of fly section increase ease of operation
  • External guides at top of base secton securely interlock rails
  • Rugged gravity spring locks operate smoothly
  • Base and fly separate easily to use base section as single ladder
  • Rugged, heavy duty extruded rung locks are spring loaded to operate smoothly
  • Pre-pierced holes for easy field installation of accessories
  • Dual action feet with slip-resistant pad and spur plate for use on hard or penetrable surfaces
  • Mar-Resistant Molded End Caps
  • Ideal for utility and telecommunication industries
  • LeveLok is a registered trademark of the LeveLok Corporation.
summary:
The D7100-2LV series extension ladders boast a duty rating of 375 pounds and have factory-installed LeveLok levelers to enable the ladders to adapt to uneven terrain. With simple foot action, each leveler can extend up to 10" in 3/16" increments. These ladders are ideal for utility or telecommunication industries. The external guides at the top of the base section secure the interlocking rails. The top of the fly section has pre-pierced holes for easy installation of accessories. The base and fly sections easily separate to use the base section as a single ladder. Fiberglass rails are non-conductive for working near electricity. (36' & 40' do not have interlocking rails).

small_image_label: 7408 8' Type IAA Fiberglass Step Ladder
thumbnail_label: 7408 8' Type IAA Fiberglass Step Ladder
description: Built to last, the Werner 375-pound duty rated 7400 ladders are rugged and ready for the job. These ladders feature extra heavy duty aluminum HolsterTops, internal spreaders and external rail shields for long lasting durability. With the EDGE bracing system and GLAS*MARK Violator stripes on the rails, the 7400 series is built to handle the worksite and stands ready for tough jobs. Fiberglass rails are non-conductive for working near electricity.

Performance Overview

StyleSizeReach HeightLoad CapacityType
Platform 6'12'375 lbs.Type IAA Duty Rating

Features include:

  • Extra heavy duty aluminum HolsterTop with thick side plates
  • Back-up plates reinforce all top connectors
  • Shoulder bolt and lock nut on top hinge; 4 solid aluminum rivets attach top to each front rail
  • Slip-resistant TRACTION-TRED steps are double riveted and have extra wide knee braces
  • Full set of rear horizontals are knee braced and spaced one per foot
  • Extra heavy duty internal aluminum spreaders
  • Aluminum external rail shield helps protect against abrasion damage
  • Glas Mark Violator stripes on rails allow ladder to be more visible
  • Slip-resistant foot pads attached to the EDGE structure
  • The EDGE bracing system helps to decrease damage to rail
  • Every rivet backed up by metal, metal plates or washers to protect rails

name: 28' Type IAA Aluminum D-Rung Extension Ladder
meta_title: 28' Type IAA Aluminum D-Rung Extension Ladder
meta_description: The D500-2 aluminum extension ladders have a duty rating of 375 pounds and feature the exclusive ALFLO rung joint for a TWIST-PROOF performance every time.
small_image_label: 28' Type IAA Aluminum D-Rung Extension Ladder
thumbnail_label: 28' Type IAA Aluminum D-Rung Extension Ladder
description: The D500-2 aluminum extension ladders have a duty rating of 375 pounds and feature the exclusive ALFLO rung joint for a TWIST-PROOF performance every time.
short_description:
Features
  • Exclusive ALFLO rung joint means TWIST-PROOF performance
  • 1-3/4" Slip-resistant TRACTION-TRED D-rungs
  • Heavy Duty extruded rung locks are spring loaded to operate smoothly
  • Base and fly separate easily for use as an extension or two single sections
  • Smooth operating pulley pulley design with 3/8" rope
  • Internal guides increase ease of operation
  • Extra heavy duty I-beam rails
  • Rugged spring loaded locks operate smoothly
  • Heavy duty, self-aligning, free-swinging shoe with slip-resistant tread and replaceable steel spur plate
  • Mar-resistant end caps notched for easy separation of sections
summary:
The D500-2 aluminum extension ladders have a duty rating of 375 pounds and feature the exclusive ALFLO rung joint for a TWIST-PROOF performance every time. The end caps are mar resistant and notched for easy separation of sections. Both the base and the fly sections can be used separately. Internal guides increase the ease of operation when raising and lowering. The feet are heavy-duty, self-aligning and free swinging for hard or penetrable surfaces. Rugged spring-loaded locks operate smoothly. TRACTION-TRED D rungs are slip resistant. Duty rating changes to 300 pounds for 36'-48' models.

name: 20' Type IAA Fiberglass D-Rung Leveling Extension Ladder
meta_title: 20' Type IAA Fiberglass D-Rung Leveling Extension Ladder
meta_description: The D7100-2LV series extension ladders boast a duty rating of 375 pounds and have factory-installed LeveLok levelers to enable the ladders to adapt to uneven terrain.
small_image_label: 20' Type IAA Fiberglass D-Rung Leveling Extension Ladder
thumbnail_label: 20' Type IAA Fiberglass D-Rung Leveling Extension Ladder
description: The D7100-2LV series extension ladders boast a duty rating of 375 pounds and have factory-installed LeveLok levelers to enable the ladders to adapt to uneven terrain.
short_description:
Features
  • Factory installed LeveLok Leveler enables ladder to adapt to uneven terrain
  • With simple foot action, Leveler extends up to 10” in 3/16” increments
  • Exclusive ALFLO Rung Joint Means TWIST-PROOF Performance
  • 1-5/8" Slip-resistant TRACTION-TRED D-rungs
  • Plate and rung assembly are riveted at four points to each side rail to allow for rung replacement
  • Interlocking Side Rails with nylon coated internal rail guides on bottom of fly section increase ease of operation
  • External guides at top of base secton securely interlock rails
  • Rugged gravity spring locks operate smoothly
  • Base and fly separate easily to use base section as single ladder
  • Rugged, heavy duty extruded rung locks are spring loaded to operate smoothly
  • Pre-pierced holes for easy field installation of accessories
  • Dual action feet with slip-resistant pad and spur plate for use on hard or penetrable surfaces
  • Mar-Resistant Molded End Caps
  • Ideal for utility and telecommunication industries
  • LeveLok is a registered trademark of the LeveLok Corporation.
summary:
The D7100-2LV series extension ladders boast a duty rating of 375 pounds and have factory-installed LeveLok levelers to enable the ladders to adapt to uneven terrain. With simple foot action, each leveler can extend up to 10" in 3/16" increments. These ladders are ideal for utility or telecommunication industries. The external guides at the top of the base section secure the interlocking rails. The top of the fly section has pre-pierced holes for easy installation of accessories. The base and fly sections easily separate to use the base section as a single ladder. Fiberglass rails are non-conductive for working near electricity. (36' & 40' do not have interlocking rails)

description: The D500-2 aluminum extension ladders have a duty rating of 375 pounds and feature the exclusive ALFLO rung joint for a TWIST-PROOF performance every time.
short_description:
Features
  • Exclusive ALFLO rung joint means TWIST-PROOF performance
  • 1-3/4" Slip-resistant TRACTION-TRED D-rungs
  • Heavy Duty extruded rung locks are spring loaded to operate smoothly
  • Base and fly separate easily for use as an extension or two single sections
  • Smooth operating pulley pulley design with 3/8" rope

  • Extra heavy duty I-beam rails
  • Rugged spring loaded locks operate smoothly

summary:
The D500-2 aluminum extension ladders have a duty rating of 375 pounds and feature the exclusive ALFLO rung joint for a TWIST-PROOF performance every time. The end caps are mar resistant and notched for easy separation of sections. Both the base and the fly sections can be used separately. Internal guides increase the ease of operation when raising and lowering. The feet are heavy-duty, self-aligning and free swinging for hard or penetrable surfaces. Rugged spring-loaded locks operate smoothly. TRACTION-TRED D rungs are slip resistant. Duty rating changes to 300 pounds for 36'-48' models.

name: 22-2F Fiberglass rail shield. Comes in pairs
meta_title: 22-2F Fiberglass rail shield. Comes in pairs
small_image_label: 22-2F Fiberglass rail shield. Comes in pairs
thumbnail_label: 22-2F Fiberglass rail shield. Comes in pairs
short_description:
Features:
  • For use on the Front Rail of specified step ladders, and platform ladders
  • Shields may be used to repair ladder if rail cracks occur no higher than 3/4" below bottom rivet of bottom step or horizontal and all holes in the rail are intact
  • Kit includes one left rail shield, one right rail shield and mounting hardware
  • Rail shield for Reals rails of step & plaform ladders is sold separately. Model 22-2R
summary:
22-2F Fiberglass Rail Shields are designed to reinforce the bottom of the ladder to protect from damage on the jobsite. Shields may also be used to repair ladder if rail cracks occur no higher than 3/4" below bottom rivet of bottom step or horizontal and all holes in the rail are intact. Shields come with mounting hardware and instructions. For the front rails of the following series: 6000, T6000, 6200, 7300, T6200, 7400 (MK 13 & up), T7400 (MK11 & up), P7400 (MK13 & up), PT7400 (MK 4 & up), E7400 (MK7 & up)


Specifications
  • Approx. Cu. Ft. Per Unit: 0.16
  • Approx. Shipping Wt. Lbs.: 1.5
size_info: 22-2F Fiberglass rail shield. Comes in pairs
meta_keyword: 22-2F Fiberglass rail shield. Comes in pairs

name: 28' Type IAA Fiberglass D-Rung Extension Ladder
meta_title: 28' Type IAA Fiberglass D-Rung Extension Ladder
meta_description: The D7100-2 extension ladders boast a duty rating of 375 pounds and feature the exclusive ALFLO rung joint that guarantees TWIST-PROOF peformance.
small_image_label: 28' Type IAA Fiberglass D-Rung Extension Ladder
thumbnail_label: 28' Type IAA Fiberglass D-Rung Extension Ladder
description: The D7100-2 extension ladders boast a duty rating of 375 pounds and feature the exclusive ALFLO rung joint that guarantees TWIST-PROOF peformance.
short_description:
Features
  • Exclusive ALFLO Rung Joint Means TWIST-PROOF Performance
  • 1-5/8" Slip-resistant TRACTION-TRED D-rungs
  • Plate and rung assembly are riveted at four points to each side rail to allow for rung replacement
  • Smooth operating pulley with polypropylene rope
  • Interlocking Side Rails with nylon coated internal rail guides on bottom of fly section increase ease of operation
  • External guides at top of base secton securely interlock rails
  • Base and fly separate easily to use base section as single ladder
  • Slip-resistant Traction-Tred D-rungs
  • Rugged, heavy duty extruded rung locks are spring loaded to operate smoothly
  • Pre-pierced holes for easy field installation of accessories
  • Durable rail shield and shoe bracket protects rail from damage
  • Dual action feet with slip-resistant pad and spur plate for use on hard or penetrable surfaces
  • Mar-Resistant Molded End Caps
  • Ideal for utility and telecommunication industries
summary:
The D7100-2 extension ladders boast a duty rating of 375 pounds and feature the exclusive ALFLO rung joint that guarantees TWIST-PROOF peformance. External guides at top of base section help secure the interlocking siderails. Pre-pierced holes at the top of the fly section allow for easy field installation of accessories. The plate and rung assembly are riveted at four points to each side rail. The TRACTION-TRED D rungs are slip resistant and the durable rail shield and shoe bracket protects the rail from damage. (36' & 40' versions rated at 300 pounds and do not have interlocking rails)


Specifications
  • Size: 28'
  • Reach Height: 27'
  • Max Working Length: 25'
  • Load Capacity: 375 lbs.
  • Type: Type IAA Duty Rating
  • Material: Fiberglass
  • Rung Type: D
  • Foot Material: Slip-resistant pad
  • Number of Sections: 2
  • Certifications: ANSI A14.5 (2007); OSHA
  • Approx. Cu. Ft. Per Unit: 12
  • Approx. Shipping Wt. Lbs.: 67

    • Dimensions
  • Rails Dimension: 3-5/16"
  • Flange Dimension: 1-3/16"
  • Rung Dimension: 1-5/8"
  • Fly Width: 16-1/8"
  • Base Width: 19" outside shoes

name: 28' Type IAA Fiberglass Round Rung Extension Ladder
meta_title: 28' Type IAA Fiberglass Round Rung Extension Ladder
meta_description: The 7100-2 series extension ladders are made with non-conductive fiberglass side rails featuring TRACTION-TRED slip-resistant round rungs.
small_image_label: 28' Type IAA Fiberglass Round Rung Extension Ladder
thumbnail_label: 28' Type IAA Fiberglass Round Rung Extension Ladder
description: The 7100-2 series extension ladders are made with non-conductive fiberglass side rails featuring TRACTION-TRED slip-resistant round rungs.
short_description:
Features
  • Exclusive ALFLO Rung Joint Means TWIST-PROOF Performance
  • 1-1/4" Slip-resistant TRACTION-TRED round rungs
  • Plate and rung assembly are riveted at four points to each side rail to allow for rung replacement
  • Smooth operating pulley with polypropylene rope
  • Interlocking Side Rails with nylon coated internal rail guides on bottom of fly section increase ease of operation
  • External guides at top of base secton securely interlock rails
  • Base and fly separate easily to use base section as single ladder
  • Plate and rung assembly are riveted at four points to each side rail to allow for rung replacement
  • Rugged, heavy duty extruded rung locks are spring loaded to operate smoothly
  • Pre-pierced holes for easy field installation of accessories
  • Durable rail shield and shoe bracket protects rail from damage
  • Dual action feet with slip-resistant pad and spur plate for use on hard or penetrable surfaces
  • Mar-Resistant Molded End Caps
  • Ideal for utility and telecommunication industries
  • Shoe with slip-resistant pad and spur plate
summary:
The 7100-2 series extension ladders are made with non-conductive fiberglass side rails featuring TRACTION-TRED slip-resistant round rungs. The top of the fly section has pre-pierced holes for easy installation of accessories. Guides at the top of the base and internal guides at bottom of fly section securely interlock the rails. The plate and rung assemblies are riveted at four points to the side rails. The base and fly sections separate easily to use base section as a single ladder. Durable rail shield and shoe brackets protect rails from damage. These durable ladders boast a duty rating of 375 pounds.

The D7100-2 extension ladders boast a duty rating of 375 pounds and feature the exclusive ALFLO rung joint that guarantees TWIST-PROOF peformance. External guides at top of base section help secure the interlocking siderails. Pre-pierced holes at the top of the fly section allow for easy field installation of accessories. The plate and rung assembly are riveted at four points to each side rail. The TRACTION-TRED D rungs are slip resistant and the durable rail shield and shoe bracket protects the rail from damage. (36' & 40' versions rated at 300 pounds and do not have interlocking rails)

name: 20' Type IAA Aluminum D-Rung Extension Ladder
meta_title: 20' Type IAA Aluminum D-Rung Extension Ladder
meta_description: The D500-2 aluminum extension ladders have a duty rating of 375 pounds and feature the exclusive ALFLO rung joint for a TWIST-PROOF performance every time. The end caps are mar resistant and notched for easy separation of sections.
small_image_label: 20' Type IAA Aluminum D-Rung Extension Ladder
thumbnail_label: 20' Type IAA Aluminum D-Rung Extension Ladder
description: The D500-2 aluminum extension ladders have a duty rating of 375 pounds and feature the exclusive ALFLO rung joint for a TWIST-PROOF performance every time. The end caps are mar resistant and notched for easy separation of sections.
short_description:
Features
  • Exclusive ALFLO rung joint means TWIST-PROOF performance
  • 1-3/4" Slip-resistant TRACTION-TRED D-rungs
  • Heavy Duty extruded rung locks are spring loaded to operate smoothly
  • Base and fly separate easily for use as an extension or two single sections
  • Smooth operating pulley pulley design with 3/8" rope
  • Internal guides increase ease of operation
  • Extra heavy duty I-beam rails
  • Rugged spring loaded locks operate smoothly
  • Heavy duty, self-aligning, free-swinging shoe with slip-resistant tread and replaceable steel spur plate
  • Mar-resistant end caps notched for easy separation of sections
summary:
The D500-2 aluminum extension ladders have a duty rating of 375 pounds and feature the exclusive ALFLO rung joint for a TWIST-PROOF performance every time. The end caps are mar resistant and notched for easy separation of sections. Both the base and the fly sections can be used separately. Internal guides increase the ease of operation when raising and lowering. The feet are heavy-duty, self-aligning and free swinging for hard or penetrable surfaces. Rugged spring-loaded locks operate smoothly. TRACTION-TRED D rungs are slip resistant. Duty rating changes to 300 pounds for 36'-48' models.

meta_description: The 500-1 series are one-section round rung straight ladders with a duty rating of 375 pounds.
small_image_label: 16' Type IAA Aluminum Round Rung Straight Ladder
thumbnail_label: 16' Type IAA Aluminum Round Rung Straight Ladder
description: The 500-1 series are one-section round rung straight ladders with a duty rating of 375 pounds.
short_description:
Features
  • Exclusive ALFLO Rung joint means TWIST-PROOF Performance
  • 1-1/4" Slip-resistant TRACTION-TRED round rungs
  • Extra heavy duty I-beam rails
  • Heavy duty, self-aligning, free-swinging shoe with slip-resistant tread and replaceable steel spur plate
  • Hoop end caps
summary:
The 500-1 series are one-section round rung straight ladders with a duty rating of 375 pounds. The exclusive ALFLO rung joint means TWIST-PROOF performance every time. The side rails are extra heavy duty I-beam rails and the aluminum round rungs are deeply serrated for slip resistance. The duty rating goes to 300 pounds with the 18', 20' and 24' lengths.

name: 24' Type IAA Fiberglass Round Rung Extension Ladder
meta_title: 24' Type IAA Fiberglass Round Rung Extension Ladder
meta_description: The 7100-2 series extension ladders are made with non-conductive fiberglass side rails featuring TRACTION-TRED slip-resistant round rungs.
small_image_label: 24' Type IAA Fiberglass Round Rung Extension Ladder
thumbnail_label: 24' Type IAA Fiberglass Round Rung Extension Ladder
description: The 7100-2 series extension ladders are made with non-conductive fiberglass side rails featuring TRACTION-TRED slip-resistant round rungs.
short_description:
Features
  • Exclusive ALFLO Rung Joint Means TWIST-PROOF Performance
  • 1-1/4" Slip-resistant TRACTION-TRED round rungs
  • Plate and rung assembly are riveted at four points to each side rail to allow for rung replacement
  • Smooth operating pulley with polypropylene rope
  • Interlocking Side Rails with nylon coated internal rail guides on bottom of fly section increase ease of operation
  • External guides at top of base secton securely interlock rails
  • Base and fly separate easily to use base section as single ladder
  • Plate and rung assembly are riveted at four points to each side rail to allow for rung replacement
  • Rugged, heavy duty extruded rung locks are spring loaded to operate smoothly
  • Pre-pierced holes for easy field installation of accessories
  • Durable rail shield and shoe bracket protects rail from damage
  • Dual action feet with slip-resistant pad and spur plate for use on hard or penetrable surfaces
  • Mar-Resistant Molded End Caps
  • Ideal for utility and telecommunication industries
  • Shoe with slip-resistant pad and spur plate
summary:
The 7100-2 series extension ladders are made with non-conductive fiberglass side rails featuring TRACTION-TRED slip-resistant round rungs. The top of the fly section has pre-pierced holes for easy installation of accessories. Guides at the top of the base and internal guides at bottom of fly section securely interlock the rails. The plate and rung assemblies are riveted at four points to the side rails. The base and fly sections separate easily to use base section as a single ladder. Durable rail shield and shoe brackets protect rails from damage. These durable ladders boast a duty rating of 375 pounds.


Specifications:
  • Size: 24'
  • Reach Height: 23'
  • Max Working Length: 21'
  • Load Capacity: 375 lbs.
  • Type: Type IAA Duty Rating
  • Material: Fiberglass
  • Rung Type: Round
  • Foot Material: Slip-resistant pad
  • Number of Sections: 2
  • Certifications: ANSI A14.5 (2007); OSHA
  • Approx. Cu. Ft. Per Unit: 10.3
  • Approx. Shipping Wt. Lbs.: 55

    • Dimensions
  • Rails Dimension: 3-5/16"
  • Flange Dimension: 1-3/16"
  • Rung Dimension: 1-1/4"
  • Fly Width: 17-3/4"
  • Base Width: 19" outside shoes

name: 20' Type IAA Fiberglass D-Rung Extension Ladder
meta_title: 20' Type IAA Fiberglass D-Rung Extension Ladder
meta_description: The D7100-2 extension ladders boast a duty rating of 375 pounds and feature the exclusive ALFLO rung joint that guarantees TWIST-PROOF peformance.
small_image_label: 20' Type IAA Fiberglass D-Rung Extension Ladder
thumbnail_label: 20' Type IAA Fiberglass D-Rung Extension Ladder
description: The D7100-2 extension ladders boast a duty rating of 375 pounds and feature the exclusive ALFLO rung joint that guarantees TWIST-PROOF peformance.
short_description:
Features
  • Exclusive ALFLO Rung Joint Means TWIST-PROOF Performance
  • 1-5/8" Slip-resistant TRACTION-TRED D-rungs
  • Plate and rung assembly are riveted at four points to each side rail to allow for rung replacement
  • Smooth operating pulley with polypropylene rope
  • Interlocking Side Rails with nylon coated internal rail guides on bottom of fly section increase ease of operation
  • External guides at top of base secton securely interlock rails
  • Base and fly separate easily to use base section as single ladder
  • Slip-resistant Traction-Tred D-rungs
  • Rugged, heavy duty extruded rung locks are spring loaded to operate smoothly
  • Pre-pierced holes for easy field installation of accessories
  • Durable rail shield and shoe bracket protects rail from damage
  • Dual action feet with slip-resistant pad and spur plate for use on hard or penetrable surfaces
  • Mar-Resistant Molded End Caps
  • Ideal for utility and telecommunication industries
summary:
The D7100-2 extension ladders boast a duty rating of 375 pounds and feature the exclusive ALFLO rung joint that guarantees TWIST-PROOF peformance. External guides at top of base section help secure the interlocking siderails. Pre-pierced holes at the top of the fly section allow for easy field installation of accessories. The plate and rung assembly are riveted at four points to each side rail. The TRACTION-TRED D rungs are slip resistant and the durable rail shield and shoe bracket protects the rail from damage. (36' & 40' versions rated at 300 pounds and do not have interlocking rails)

name: 16' Type IAA Fiberglass Combination Ladder
meta_title: 16' Type IAA Fiberglass Combination Ladder
meta_description: The 7800 combination step and extension ladders are versatile and easy to transport yet carry a duty rating of 375 pounds. As an extension ladder, the top rung is a padded V-rung for use against a tree or a pole.
small_image_label: 16' Type IAA Fiberglass Combination Ladder
thumbnail_label: 16' Type IAA Fiberglass Combination Ladder
description: The 7800 combination step and extension ladders are versatile and easy to transport yet carry a duty rating of 375 pounds. As an extension ladder, the top rung is a padded V-rung for use against a tree or a pole.
short_description:
Features
  • Protective, mar-resistant rubber covered molded end caps, wall bumpers & padded V-Rung
  • Slip-Resistant TRACTION-TRED Round Rungs
  • Fixed aluminum locks with bearing plates to distribute load on rung
  • Nylon coated rung wear sleeves and guides increase ease of operation
  • Heavy gauge steel bracket engages steel pin to lock section in stepladder position
  • Extra Large Feet with Ribbed Rubber Pads
  • Plate and rung assembly are riveted at four points to each side rail to allow for rung replacement
  • Design for one or two-person jobs
  • Maximum load per side, including person and materials, shall not exceed duty rating of ladder
  • Combination ladder design can be quickly converted from twin stepladder position to straight ladder position
  • Exclusive ALFLO Rung plate joints for TWIST-PROOF Performance
summary:
The 7800 combination step and extension ladders are versatile and easy to transport yet carry a duty rating of 375 pounds. As an extension ladder, the top rung is a padded V-rung for use against a tree or a pole. The protective rubber covered end caps are mar-resistant. Nylon-coated rung wear sleeves and guides increase the ease of raising and lowering the extension. Fixed aluminum locks with bearing plates distribute the load onto the rung where it should be. The TRACTION-TRED round rungs are slip resistant. In the stepladder position, this ladder can be used by one or two people. The 375 pound duty rating applies to each side of the ladder making it ideal for the worksite.


Specifications

name: 20' Type IAA Fiberglass Round Rung Extension Ladder
meta_title: 20' Type IAA Fiberglass Round Rung Extension Ladder
meta_description: The 7100-2 series extension ladders are made with non-conductive fiberglass side rails featuring TRACTION-TRED slip-resistant round rungs.
small_image_label: 20' Type IAA Fiberglass Round Rung Extension Ladder
thumbnail_label: 20' Type IAA Fiberglass Round Rung Extension Ladder
description: The 7100-2 series extension ladders are made with non-conductive fiberglass side rails featuring TRACTION-TRED slip-resistant round rungs.
short_description:
Features include:

  • Exclusive ALFLO Rung Joint Means TWIST-PROOF Performance
  • 1-1/4" Slip-resistant TRACTION-TRED round rungs
  • Plate and rung assembly are riveted at four points to each side rail to allow for rung replacement
  • Smooth operating pulley with polypropylene rope
  • Interlocking Side Rails with nylon coated internal rail guides on bottom of fly section increase ease of operation
  • External guides at top of base secton securely interlock rails
  • Base and fly separate easily to use base section as single ladder
  • Plate and rung assembly are riveted at four points to each side rail to allow for rung replacement
  • Rugged, heavy duty extruded rung locks are spring loaded to operate smoothly
  • Pre-pierced holes for easy field installation of accessories
  • Durable rail shield and shoe bracket protects rail from damage
  • Dual action feet with slip-resistant pad and spur plate for use on hard or penetrable surfaces
  • Mar-Resistant Molded End Caps
  • Ideal for utility and telecommunication industries
  • Shoe with slip-resistant pad and spur plate
summary:
The 7100-2 series extension ladders are made with non-conductive fiberglass side rails featuring TRACTION-TRED slip-resistant round rungs. The top of the fly section has pre-pierced holes for easy installation of accessories. Guides at the top of the base and internal guides at bottom of fly section securely interlock the rails. The plate and rung assemblies are riveted at four points to the side rails. The base and fly sections separate easily to use base section as a single ladder. Durable rail shield and shoe brackets protect rails from damage. These durable ladders boast a duty rating of 375 pounds.


Specifications

  • Reach Height: 19'
  • Max Working Length: 17'

name: 14' Type IAA Fiberglass Combination Ladder Write the first review
meta_title: 14' Type IAA Fiberglass Combination Ladder Write the first review
meta_description: The 7800 combination step and extension ladders are versatile and easy to transport yet carry a duty rating of 375 pounds.
small_image_label: 14' Type IAA Fiberglass Combination Ladder Write the first review
thumbnail_label: 14' Type IAA Fiberglass Combination Ladder Write the first review
description: The 7800 combination step and extension ladders are versatile and easy to transport yet carry a duty rating of 375 pounds.
short_description:
Features include:

  • Combination ladder design can be quickly converted from twin stepladder position to straight ladder position
  • Exclusive ALFLO Rung plate joints for TWIST-PROOF Performance
  • Protective, mar-resistant rubber covered molded end caps, wall bumpers & padded V-Rung
  • Slip-Resistant TRACTION-TRED Round Rungs
  • Fixed aluminum locks with bearing plates to distribute load on rung
  • Nylon coated rung wear sleeves and guides increase ease of operation
  • Heavy gauge steel bracket engages steel pin to lock section in stepladder position
  • Extra Large Feet with Ribbed Rubber Pads
  • Plate and rung assembly are riveted at four points to each side rail to allow for rung replacement
  • Design for one or two-person jobs
  • Maximum load per side, including person and materials, shall not exceed duty rating of ladder
summary:
The 7800 combination step and extension ladders are versatile and easy to transport yet carry a duty rating of 375 pounds. As an extension ladder, the top rung is a padded V-rung for use against a tree or a pole. The protective rubber covered end caps are mar-resistant. Nylon-coated rung wear sleeves and guides increase the ease of raising and lowering the extension. Fixed aluminum locks with bearing plates distribute the load onto the rung where it should be. The TRACTION-TRED round rungs are slip resistant. In the stepladder position, this ladder can be used by one or two people. The 375 pound duty rating applies to each side of the ladder making it ideal for the worksite

name: 12' Type IAA Fiberglass Combination Ladder Write the first review
meta_title: 12' Type IAA Fiberglass Combination Ladder Write the first review
meta_description: The 7800 combination step and extension ladders are versatile and easy to transport yet carry a duty rating of 375 pounds.
small_image_label: 12' Type IAA Fiberglass Combination Ladder Write the first review
thumbnail_label: 12' Type IAA Fiberglass Combination Ladder Write the first review
description: The 7800 combination step and extension ladders are versatile and easy to transport yet carry a duty rating of 375 pounds.
short_description:
Features include:

  • Combination ladder design can be quickly converted from twin stepladder position to straight ladder position
  • Exclusive ALFLO Rung plate joints for TWIST-PROOF Performance
  • Protective, mar-resistant rubber covered molded end caps, wall bumpers & padded V-Rung
  • Slip-Resistant TRACTION-TRED Round Rungs
  • Fixed aluminum locks with bearing plates to distribute load on rung
  • Nylon coated rung wear sleeves and guides increase ease of operation
  • Heavy gauge steel bracket engages steel pin to lock section in stepladder position
  • Extra Large Feet with Ribbed Rubber Pads
  • Plate and rung assembly are riveted at four points to each side rail to allow for rung replacement
  • Design for one or two-person jobs
  • Maximum load per side, including person and materials, shall not exceed duty rating of ladder
summary:
The 7800 combination step and extension ladders are versatile and easy to transport yet carry a duty rating of 375 pounds. As an extension ladder, the top rung is a padded V-rung for use against a tree or a pole. The protective rubber covered end caps are mar-resistant. Nylon-coated rung wear sleeves and guides increase the ease of raising and lowering the extension. Fixed aluminum locks with bearing plates distribute the load onto the rung where it should be. The TRACTION-TRED round rungs are slip resistant. In the stepladder position, this ladder can be used by one or two people. The 375 pound duty rating applies to each side of the ladder making it ideal for the worksite.


Specifications

  • Size: 12'
  • Reach Height: 12'
  • Max Working Length: 9'6"
  • Load Capacity: 375 lbs.
  • Type: Type IAA Duty Rating
  • Performance Rating: 5 Star

  • Rung Type: Round
  • Foot Material: Slip-resistant pad
  • Number of Sections: 2
  • Certifications: ANSI A14.5 (2007); OSHA

meta_description: The D7100-2 extension ladders boast a duty rating of 375 pounds and feature the exclusive ALFLO rung joint that guarantees TWIST-PROOF peformance.
small_image_label: 16' Type IAA Fiberglass D-Rung Extension Ladder
thumbnail_label: 16' Type IAA Fiberglass D-Rung Extension Ladder
description: The D7100-2 extension ladders boast a duty rating of 375 pounds and feature the exclusive ALFLO rung joint that guarantees TWIST-PROOF peformance.
short_description:
Features include:

  • Exclusive ALFLO Rung Joint Means TWIST-PROOF Performance
  • 1-5/8" Slip-resistant TRACTION-TRED D-rungs
  • Plate and rung assembly are riveted at four points to each side rail to allow for rung replacement
  • Slip-resistant Traction-Tred D-rungs
  • Pre-pierced holes for easy field installation of accessories
  • Durable rail shield and shoe bracket protects rail from damage
  • Dual action feet with slip-resistant pad and spur plate for use on hard or penetrable surfaces
  • Mar-Resistant Molded End Caps
  • Ideal for utility and telecommunication industries
summary:
The D7100-2 extension ladders boast a duty rating of 375 pounds and feature the exclusive ALFLO rung joint that guarantees TWIST-PROOF peformance. External guides at top of base section help secure the interlocking siderails. Pre-pierced holes at the top of the fly section allow for easy field installation of accessories. The plate and rung assembly are riveted at four points to each side rail. The TRACTION-TRED D rungs are slip resistant and the durable rail shield and shoe bracket protects the rail from damage. (36' & 40' versions rated at 300 pounds and do not have interlocking rails)


Specifications

  • Size: 16'
  • Reach Height: 16'
  • Max Working Length: 13'
  • Load Capacity: 375 lbs.
  • Type: Type IAA Duty Rating
  • Performance Rating: 5 star
  • Material: Fiberglass
  • Rung Type: D
  • Foot Material: Slip-resistant pad
  • Number of Sections: 2
  • Certifications: ANSI A14.5 (2007); OSHA
  • Approx. Cu. Ft. Per Unit: 7
  • Approx. Shipping Wt. Lbs.: 41

    • Dimensions

  • Rails Dimension: 3-5/16"
  • Flange Dimension: 1-3/16"
  • Rung Dimension: 1-5/8"
  • Fly Width: 16-1/8"
  • Base Width: 19" outside shoes
