name: 16' Type IAA Fiberglass Round Rung Extension Ladder
meta_title: 16' Type IAA Fiberglass Round Rung Extension Ladder
meta_description: The 7100-2 series extension ladders are made with non-conductive fiberglass side rails featuring TRACTION-TRED slip-resistant round rungs.
small_image_label: 16' Type IAA Fiberglass Round Rung Extension Ladder
thumbnail_label: 16' Type IAA Fiberglass Round Rung Extension Ladder
description: The 7100-2 series extension ladders are made with non-conductive fiberglass side rails featuring TRACTION-TRED slip-resistant round rungs.
short_description:
Features include:

  • Exclusive ALFLO Rung Joint Means TWIST-PROOF Performance
  • 1-1/4" Slip-resistant TRACTION-TRED round rungs
  • Plate and rung assembly are riveted at four points to each side rail to allow for rung replacement
  • Smooth operating pulley with polyester rope
  • Interlocking Side Rails with nylon coated internal rail guides on bottom of fly section increase ease of operation
  • External guides at top of base secton securely interlock rails
  • Base and fly separate easily to use base section as single ladder
  • Plate and rung assembly are riveted at four points to each side rail to allow for rung replacement
  • Rugged, heavy duty extruded rung locks are spring loaded to operate smoothly
  • Pre-pierced holes for easy field installation of accessories
  • Durable rail shield and shoe bracket protects rail from damage
  • Dual action feet with slip-resistant pad and spur plate for use on hard or penetrable surfaces
  • Mar-Resistant Molded End Caps
  • Ideal for utility and telecommunication industries
  • Shoe with slip-resistant pad and spur plate
summary:
The 7100-2 series extension ladders are made with non-conductive fiberglass side rails featuring TRACTION-TRED slip-resistant round rungs. The top of the fly section has pre-pierced holes for easy installation of accessories. Guides at the top of the base and internal guides at bottom of fly section securely interlock the rails. The plate and rung assemblies are riveted at four points to the side rails. The base and fly sections separate easily to use base section as a single ladder. Durable rail shield and shoe brackets protect rails from damage. These durable ladders boast a duty rating of 375 pounds.

description: The S7900 series is a Fiberglass Tappered Sectional Ladder with a base, middle and top section that can be combined to reach to reach 12', 16', or 20' lengths. Durable rail shields and shoe brackets protects the rail from damage. TRACTION-TRED round rungs are slip resistant, and the exclusive ALFLO rung joint means TWIST-PROOF performance every time. These ladders are made of non-conductive fiberglass rails and have a duty rating of 375 pounds.
short_description:
Features include:

  • Middle section of the S7900 tapered sectional ladder system
  • Must be used in conjunction with model S7906-1 base section
  • Optional molded end caps (Model S7901)
  • Exclusive ALFLO rung joint means TWIST-PROOF performance
  • Hand operated taper-lock secures mating sections
  • Slip-resistant TRACTION-TRED round rungs nest to top channel of sections when sections are joined
  • A maximum of two pieces of S7906-2 can be use in conjunction with S7906-1 base and S7906-3 top sections
  • Shoe with slip-resistant pad and spur plate

meta_description: The 7100-1 ladders are one section straight ladders made with non-conductive fiberglass rails. Easy to transport and maneuver, these ladders bear a duty rating of 375 pounds making them durable and long lasting. The slip-resistant, TRACTION-TRED rungs
small_image_label: 14' Type IAA Fiberglass Round Rung Straight Ladder
thumbnail_label: 14' Type IAA Fiberglass Round Rung Straight Ladder
description: The 7100-1 ladders are one section straight ladders made with non-conductive fiberglass rails. Easy to transport and maneuver, these ladders bear a duty rating of 375 pounds making them durable and long lasting. The slip-resistant, TRACTION-TRED rungs are round, and the durable rail shields and shoe brackets help to protect the rails from damage. The plate and rung assemblies are riveted at four points to the side rails.
short_description:
Features include:

  • Exclusive ALFLO Rung Joint Means TWIST-PROOF Performance
  • 1-1/4" Slip-resistant TRACTION-TRED round rungs
  • Plate and rung assembly are riveted at four points to each side rail to allow for rung replacement
  • Rugged, heavy duty extruded rung locks are spring loaded to operate smoothly
  • Pre-pierced holes for easy field installation of accessories
  • Durable rail shield and shoe bracket protects rail from damage
  • Dual action feet with slip-resistant pad and spur plate for use on hard or penetrable surfaces
  • Mar-Resistant Molded End Caps
  • Ideal for utility and telecommunication industries
  • Shoe with slip-resistant pad and spur plate

name: 10' Type IAA Fiberglass Manhole Ladder
meta_title: 10' Type IAA Fiberglass Manhole Ladder
meta_description: The M7100-1 Manhole ladders feature 3' replaceable plastic sleeves that protect the upper rails from manhole damage. These sleeves increase the longevity of the ladder. The combination rail shield and shoe protects the bottom of the rails from damage.
small_image_label: 10' Type IAA Fiberglass Manhole Ladder
thumbnail_label: 10' Type IAA Fiberglass Manhole Ladder
description: The M7100-1 Manhole ladders feature 3' replaceable plastic sleeves that protect the upper rails from manhole damage. These sleeves increase the longevity of the ladder. The combination rail shield and shoe protects the bottom of the rails from damage. The exclusive ALFLO rung joint means TWIST-PROOF performance, and these ladders also have a duty rating of 375 pounds. The vinyl coated aluminum hoop end caps are ideal for easily removing the ladder from the manhole. The TRACTION-TRED round rungs are slip resistant.
short_description:
Features include:

  • Narrow 12-3/8" width design is ideal for special purposes like work in manholes
  • Exclusive ALFLO rung joint means TWIST-PROOF performance
  • Mar-resistant, vinyl coated aluminum hoop end caps for removing ladder from manhole
  • 3' replaceable plastic sleeves to avoid manhole rim damage to rail
  • Slip-resistant TRACTION-TRED round rungs
  • Combination rail shield and shoe protects bottom of rail from damage

name: 32' Type IA All Fiberglass Round Rung Extension Ladder
meta_title: 32' Type IA All Fiberglass Round Rung Extension Ladder
meta_description: The 9500-2 All-Fiberglass Extension ladders are ideal in highly-corrosive environments. Where most fiberglass extension ladders have aluminum rungs, the 5900-2 series has unique box-beam rails that are connected with a fiberglass pultruded rung. Nylon
small_image_label: 32' Type IA All Fiberglass Round Rung Extension Ladder
thumbnail_label: 32' Type IA All Fiberglass Round Rung Extension Ladder
description: The 9500-2 All-Fiberglass Extension ladders are ideal in highly-corrosive environments. Where most fiberglass extension ladders have aluminum rungs, the 5900-2 series has unique box-beam rails that are connected with a fiberglass pultruded rung. Nylon plugs interlock the entire rung-to-rail connections. Two heavy duty guide brackets are secured to the top of the base section for ease of operation. Thick rubber treads and spur plates provide a solid foundation at the foot. These ladders bear a duty rating of 300 pounds.
short_description:
Features include:

  • All Fiberglass rungs and rails ideal for harsh environments
  • Unique box-beam rails are connected with a fiberglass rung
  • Rail and rung are connected with reinforced nylon plugs that interlock the entire system
  • Thick rubber treads and convenient spur plates provide a solid foundation
  • Spring-assisted mechanism has polymer flippers for longer life and a quiet sliding action over the rungs
  • Two heavy duty guide brackets are secured to the top of the base section
  • Protective molded endcaps mounted at the top of the ladder

thumbnail_label: 24' Type IA All Fiberglass Round Rung Extension Ladder
description: The 9500-2 All-Fiberglass Extension ladders are ideal in highly-corrosive environments. Where most fiberglass extension ladders have aluminum rungs, the 5900-2 series has unique box-beam rails that are connected with a fiberglass pultruded rung. Nylon plugs interlock the entire rung-to-rail connections. Two heavy duty guide brackets are secured to the top of the base section for ease of operation. Thick rubber treads and spur plates provide a solid foundation at the foot. These ladders bear a duty rating of 300 pounds.

  • Thick rubber treads and convenient spur plates provide a solid foundation
  • Spring-assisted mechanism has polymer flippers for longer life and a quiet sliding action over the rungs
  • Two heavy duty guide brackets are secured to the top of the base section
  • Protective molded endcaps mounted at the top of the ladder

description: The D7100-2 extension ladders boast a duty rating of 375 pounds and feature the exclusive ALFLO rung joint that guarantees TWIST-PROOF peformance. External guides at top of base section help secure the interlocking siderails. Pre-pierced holes at the top of the fly section allow for easy field installation of accessories. The plate and rung assembly are riveted at four points to each side rail. The TRACTION-TRED D rungs are slip resistant and the durable rail shield and shoe bracket protects the rail from damage. (36' & 40' versions rated at 300 pounds and do not have interlocking rails)
short_description:
• Exclusive ALFLO rung joint means TWIST-PROOF performance
  • 1-1/4" Slip-resistant Traction-Tred D-rungs
  • Plate and rung assembly are riveted at four points to each side rail to allow for rung replacement
  • Smooth operating pulley with polypropylene rope
  • Interlocking Side Rails with nylon coated internal rail guides on bottom of fly section increase ease of operation
  • External guides at top of base secton securely interlock rails
  • Slip-resistant Traction-Tred D-rungs
  • Rugged, heavy duty extruded rung locks are spring loaded to operate smoothly
  • Pre-pierced holes for easy field installation of accessories
  • Durable rail shield and shoe bracket protects rail from damage
  • Dual action feet with slip-resistant pad and spur plate for use on hard or penetrable surfaces
  • Mar-Resistant Molded End Caps
  • Ideal for utility and telecommunication industries

Internal guides increase the ease of operation when raising and lowering. The feet are heavy-duty, self-aligning and free swinging for hard or penetrable surfaces. meta_description: The 9500-1 All-Fiberglass Straight ladders are ideal in highly-corrosive environments. Where most fiberglass extension ladders have aluminum rungs, the 5900-1 series has unique box-beam rails that are connected with a fiberglass pultruded rung. Nylon p

thumbnail_label: 20' Type IA All Fiberglass Round Rung Extension Ladder
description: The 9500-1 All-Fiberglass Straight ladders are ideal in highly-corrosive environments. Where most fiberglass extension ladders have aluminum rungs, the 5900-1 series has unique box-beam rails that are connected with a fiberglass pultruded rung. Nylon plugs interlock the entire rung-to-rail connections. Thick rubber treads and spur plates provide a solid foundation at the foot. These ladders bear a duty rating of 300 pounds.
short_description:
Features include:

  • All Fiberglass rungs and rails ideal for harsh environments
  • Unique box-beam rails are connected with a fiberglass rung
  • Rail and rung are connected with reinforced nylon plugs that interlock the entire system
  • Thick rubber treads and convenient spur plates provide a solid foundation
  • Spring-assisted mechanism has polymer flippers for longer life and a quiet sliding action over the rungs
  • Two heavy duty guide brackets are secured to the top of the base section
  • Protective molded endcaps mounted at the top of the ladder

Center anchor points distribute force to each rail, and fall protection tie-offs are located every 5 to 6' along the length of the ladder. GLAS MARK violator stripes allow for added visibility. The rounded aluminum hoop shoe with ribbed rubber pad provides solid footing. These ladders have a duty rating of 300 pounds and are made with non-conductive fiberglass side rails.

description: The TPF00-1 ladders are posting ladders with a tapered design of the rails and 1" diameter solid aluminum hooks with aluminum rail shields at the top of the ladders. The large 9 3/4" hook opening allows for easy attachment on the job. Center anchor points distribute the load to each rail, and fall protection tie-offs are located every 5 to 6' along the length of the ladder. The 3" slip-resistant TRACTION-TRED steps are double riveted and braced on the front and back. The TPF00-1 series has a duty rating of 300 pounds.
short_description:
Features include:

  • 1" diameter solid aluminum hook with aluminum rail shield (large 9-3/4" hook opening allows for easy attachment)
  • 3" slip resistant Traction-Tred steps are double riveted and braced front and back
  • Center anchor points distribute force to each rail. Fall protection tie-offs located every 5' to 6' along the ladder
  • Glas*Mark violator stripes for added visibility
  • Rounded aluminum hoop shoe with ribbed rubber pad provides solid footing

meta_description: The 9500-1 All-Fiberglass Straight ladders are ideal in highly-corrosive environments. Where most fiberglass extension ladders have aluminum rungs, the 5900-1 series has unique box-beam rails that are connected with a fiberglass pultruded rung. Nylon
small_image_label: 18' Type IA All Fiberglass Round Rung Extension Ladder
thumbnail_label: 18' Type IA All Fiberglass Round Rung Extension Ladder
description: The 9500-1 All-Fiberglass Straight ladders are ideal in highly-corrosive environments. Where most fiberglass extension ladders have aluminum rungs, the 5900-1 series has unique box-beam rails that are connected with a fiberglass pultruded rung. Nylon plugs interlock the entire rung-to-rail connections. Thick rubber treads and spur plates provide a solid foundation at the foot. These ladders bear a duty rating of 300 pounds.
short_description:
Features include:

  • All Fiberglass rungs and rails ideal for harsh environments
  • Unique box-beam rails are connected with a fiberglass rung
  • Rail and rung are connected with reinforced nylon plugs that interlock the entire system
  • Thick rubber treads and convenient spur plates provide a solid foundation
  • Two heavy duty guide brackets are secured to the top of the base section
  • Protective molded endcaps mounted at the top of the ladder

name: 40' Type IA Aluminum D-Rung Extension Ladder
meta_title: 40' Type IA Aluminum D-Rung Extension Ladder
meta_description: The D1500-2 series aluminum extension ladders have a duty rating of 300 pounds and have extra heavy duty I-beam side rails. The base and fly sections separate easily and can be used separately. Guide brackets help to ease operation when raising and low
small_image_label: 40' Type IA Aluminum D-Rung Extension Ladder
thumbnail_label: 40' Type IA Aluminum D-Rung Extension Ladder
description: The D1500-2 series aluminum extension ladders have a duty rating of 300 pounds and have extra heavy duty I-beam side rails. The base and fly sections separate easily and can be used separately. Guide brackets help to ease operation when raising and lowering the fly section. The exclusive ALFLO rung joint means TWIST-PROOF performance every time. TRACTION-TRED D rungs are slip resistant, and the rugged shoes rest flat or are held in spur position with the SHU-LOK feature. Rugged spring-loaded locks operate smoothly. Mar-resistant end caps protect the surface ladder is resting against.
short_description:
Features include:

  • Exclusive ALFLO rung joint means TWIST-PROOF performance
  • 1-3/4" Slip-resistant Traction-Tred D-rungs
  • Heavy Duty extruded rung locks are spring loaded to operate smoothly
  • Base and fly separate easily for use as an extension or two single sections
  • Smooth operating pulley design – enclosed shape protects pulley
  • Guide brackets mounted at the top and bottom of the rail for durability and smooth operation of fly section
  • Extra heavy duty I-beam rails
  • Rugged spring loaded locks operate smoothly
  • Rugged shoe rests flat or is held in spur position with SHU-LOK feature
  • Stacked rail design provides increased rung width on fly section
  • Mar-resistant end caps

name: 40' Type IAA Fiberglass D-Rung Extension Ladder
meta_title: 40' Type IAA Fiberglass D-Rung Extension Ladder
meta_description: The D6200-2 fiberglass extension ladders have non-conductive rails making these ladders ideal for working near electricity. With a duty rating of 300 pounds, the D6200-2 series is durable and long lasting. The exclusive ALFLO rung joint means TWIST-PRO
small_image_label: 40' Type IAA Fiberglass D-Rung Extension Ladder
thumbnail_label: 40' Type IAA Fiberglass D-Rung Extension Ladder
description: The D6200-2 fiberglass extension ladders have non-conductive rails making these ladders ideal for working near electricity. With a duty rating of 300 pounds, the D6200-2 series is durable and long lasting. The exclusive ALFLO rung joint means TWIST-PROOF performance on the job. The Traction-Tred D rungs are slip resistant and the side rails are interlocking. The dual action feet are for use on hard or penetrable surfaces and swivel easily. The base and fly sections separate easily to use the base section as a single ladder. The durable rail shield bracket and shoe help protect the bottom of the rail. The fly section rails are pre-pierced at the top for easy field installation of accessories.
short_description:
Features include:

  • Exclusive ALFLO rung joint means TWIST-PROOF performance
  • 1-5/8" Slip-resistant Traction-Tred D-rungs
  • Smooth operating pulley with polyester rope
  • Interlocking Side Rails with internal rail guides on bottom of fly section securely connect rails
  • Two sets of external guides at top of base section securely interlock rails
  • Heavy Duty extruded rung locks are spring loaded to operate smoothly
  • Pre-pierced holes for easy field installation of accessories
  • Base and fly separate easily to use base section as single ladder
  • Combination Rail Shield Bracket and Shoe with Shu-Lok and Slip-Resistant Pad
  • Molded Rung Braces on bottom step for increases durability
  • Mar-Resistant Molded End Caps

small_image_label: 14' Type IA All Fiberglass Round Rung Extension Ladder
thumbnail_label: 14' Type IA All Fiberglass Round Rung Extension Ladder
description: The 9500-1 All-Fiberglass Straight ladders are ideal in highly-corrosive environments. Where most fiberglass extension ladders have aluminum rungs, the 5900-1 series has unique box-beam rails that are connected with a fiberglass pultruded rung. Nylon plugs interlock the entire rung-to-rail connections. Thick rubber treads and spur plates provide a solid foundation at the foot. These ladders bear a duty rating of 300 pounds.
short_description:
Features include:

  • All Fiberglass rungs and rails ideal for harsh environments
  • Unique box-beam rails are connected with a fiberglass rung
  • Rail and rung are connected with reinforced nylon plugs that interlock the entire system
  • Thick rubber treads and convenient spur plates provide a solid foundation
  • Two heavy duty guide brackets are secured to the top of the base section
  • Protective molded endcaps mounted at the top of the ladder

meta_title: 36' Type IA Fiberglass D-Rung Extension Ladder
meta_description: The D6200-2 fiberglass extension ladders have non-conductive rails making these ladders ideal for working near electricity. With a duty rating of 300 pounds, the D6200-2 series is durable and long lasting. The exclusive ALFLO rung joint means TWIST-PRO
small_image_label: 36' Type IA Fiberglass D-Rung Extension Ladder
thumbnail_label: 36' Type IA Fiberglass D-Rung Extension Ladder
description: The D6200-2 fiberglass extension ladders have non-conductive rails making these ladders ideal for working near electricity. With a duty rating of 300 pounds, the D6200-2 series is durable and long lasting. The exclusive ALFLO rung joint means TWIST-PROOF performance on the job. The TRACTION-TRED D rungs are slip resistant and the side rails are interlocking. The dual action feet are for use on hard or penetrable surfaces and swivel easily. The base and fly sections separate easily to use the base section as a single ladder. The durable rail shield bracket and shoe help protect the bottom of the rail. The fly section rails are pre-pierced at the top for easy field installation of accessories.
short_description:
Features include:

  • Exclusive ALFLO rung joint means TWIST-PROOF performance
  • 1-5/8" Slip-resistant Traction-Tred D-rungs
  • Smooth operating pulley with polyester rope
  • Interlocking Side Rails with internal rail guides on bottom of fly section securely connect rails
  • Two sets of external guides at top of base secton securely interlock rails
  • Heavy Duty extruded rung locks are spring loaded to operate smoothly
  • Pre-pierced holes for easy field installation of accessories
  • Base and fly separate easily to use base section as single ladder
  • Combination Rail Shield Bracket and Shoe with SHU-LOK and Slip-Resistant Pad
  • Molded Rung Braces on bottom step for increases durability
  • Mar-Resistant Molded End Caps

name: 32' Type IA Aluminum D-Rung Extension Ladder
meta_title: 32' Type IA Aluminum D-Rung Extension Ladder
meta_description: The D1500-2 series aluminum extension ladders have a duty rating of 300 pounds and have extra heavy duty I-beam side rails. The base and fly sections separate easily and can be used separately. Guide brackets help to ease operation when raising and low
small_image_label: 32' Type IA Aluminum D-Rung Extension Ladder
thumbnail_label: 32' Type IA Aluminum D-Rung Extension Ladder
description: The D1500-2 series aluminum extension ladders have a duty rating of 300 pounds and have extra heavy duty I-beam side rails. The base and fly sections separate easily and can be used separately. Guide brackets help to ease operation when raising and lowering the fly section. The exclusive ALFLO rung joint means TWIST-PROOF performance every time. TRACTION-TRED D rungs are slip resistant, and the rugged shoes rest flat or are held in spur position with the SHU-LOK feature. Rugged spring-loaded locks operate smoothly. Mar-resistant end caps protect the surface ladder is resting against.
short_description:
Features include:

  • Exclusive ALFLO rung joint means TWIST-PROOF performance
  • 1-3/4" Slip-resistant Traction-Tred D-rungs
  • Heavy Duty extruded rung locks are spring loaded to operate smoothly
  • Base and fly separate easily for use as an extension or two single sections
  • Smooth operating pulley design – enclosed shape protects pulley
  • Guide brackets mounted at the top and bottom of the rail for durability and smooth operation of fly section
  • Extra heavy duty I-beam rails
  • Rugged spring loaded locks operate smoothly
  • Rugged shoe rests flat or is held in spur position with SHU-LOK feature
  • Stacked rail design provides increased rung width on fly section
  • Mar-resistant end caps

thumbnail_label: 12' Type IA All Fiberglass Round Rung Extension Ladder
description: The 9500-1 All-Fiberglass Straight ladders are ideal in highly-corrosive environments. Where most fiberglass extension ladders have aluminum rungs, the 5900-1 series has unique box-beam rails that are connected with a fiberglass pultruded rung. Nylon plugs interlock the entire rung-to-rail connections. Thick rubber treads and spur plates provide a solid foundation at the foot. These ladders bear a duty rating of 300 pounds.
short_description:
Features include:

  • All Fiberglass rungs and rails ideal for harsh environments
  • Unique box-beam rails are connected with a fiberglass rung
  • Rail and rung are connected with reinforced nylon plugs that interlock the entire system
  • Thick rubber treads and convenient spur plates provide a solid foundation
  • Two heavy duty guide brackets are secured to the top of the base section
  • Protective molded endcaps mounted at the top of the ladder

thumbnail_label: 28' Type IA Fiberglass D-Rung Equalizer Extension Ladder
description: D8200-2EQ The Equalizer series eliminates uneven ground with the factory installed adjustable EverLevel leveling system. This system precisely adjusts in 3/8" increments up to 8 1/4", making it easy to use. The dual action feet on the ladder are for use on hard or penetrable surfaces and swivel easily. The Traction-Tred D-rungs are slip resistant. The ladder has a duty rating of 300 pounds making it durable, long lasting and able to meet the demands of the job. The exclusive ALFLO rung joint means a TWIST-PROOF performance every time, and the fiberglass rails are non-conductive.

  • Factory installed adjustable EverLevel leveling system exceeds OSHA and ANSI requirements

Unique three section design allows the ladder to be stored and transported more easily due to shorter lenght than a 2 section ladder. With a duty rating of 300 pounds, the D6200-3 series is durable and long lasting. The exclusive ALFLO rung joint means TWIST-PROOF performance on the job. The durable rail shield bracket and shoe help protect the bottom of the rail.

small_image_label: 10' Type IA All Fiberglass Round Rung Extension Ladder
thumbnail_label: 10' Type IA All Fiberglass Round Rung Extension Ladder
description: The 9500-1 All-Fiberglass Straight ladders are ideal in highly-corrosive environments. Where most fiberglass extension ladders have aluminum rungs, the 5900-1 series has unique box-beam rails that are connected with a fiberglass pultruded rung. Nylon plugs interlock the entire rung-to-rail connections. Thick rubber treads and spur plates provide a solid foundation at the foot. These ladders bear a duty rating of 300 pounds.
short_description:
Features include:

  • All Fiberglass rungs and rails ideal for harsh environments
  • Unique box-beam rails are connected with a fiberglass rung
  • Rail and rung are connected with reinforced nylon plugs that interlock the entire system
  • Thick rubber treads and convenient spur plates provide a solid foundation
  • Two heavy duty guide brackets are secured to the top of the base section
  • Protective molded endcaps mounted at the top of the ladder

meta_title: 24' Type IA Aluminum D-Rung Extension Ladder
meta_description: The D1500-2 series aluminum extension ladders have a duty rating of 300 pounds and have extra heavy duty I-beam side rails. The base and fly sections separate easily and can be used separately. Guide brackets help to ease operation when raising and low
small_image_label: 24' Type IA Aluminum D-Rung Extension Ladder
thumbnail_label: 24' Type IA Aluminum D-Rung Extension Ladder
description: The D1500-2 series aluminum extension ladders have a duty rating of 300 pounds and have extra heavy duty I-beam side rails. The base and fly sections separate easily and can be used separately. Guide brackets help to ease operation when raising and lowering the fly section. The exclusive ALFLO rung joint means TWIST-PROOF performance every time. TRACTION-TRED D rungs are slip resistant, and the rugged shoes rest flat or are held in spur position with the SHU-LOK feature. Rugged spring-loaded locks operate smoothly. Mar-resistant end caps protect the surface ladder is resting against.
short_description:
Features include:

  • Smooth operating pulley design – enclosed shape protects pulley
  • Guide brackets mounted at the top and bottom of the rail for durability and smooth operation of fly section
  • Extra heavy duty I-beam rails
  • Rugged spring loaded locks operate smoothly
  • Rugged shoe rests flat or is held in spur position with SHU-LOK feature
  • Stacked rail design provides increased rung width on fly section
  • Mar-resistant end caps
  • Exclusive ALFLO rung joint means TWIST-PROOF performance
  • 1-3/4" Slip-resistant Traction-Tred D-rungs
  • Heavy Duty extruded rung locks are spring loaded to operate smoothly
  • Base and fly separate easily for use as an extension or two single sections

  • Protective molded endcaps mounted at the top of the ladder

meta_description: The D6200-2 fiberglass extension ladders have non-conductive rails making these ladders ideal for working near electricity. With a duty rating of 300 pounds, the D6200-2 series is durable and long lasting. The exclusive ALFLO rung joint means TWIST-PRO

thumbnail_label: 24' Type IAA Fiberglass D-Rung Extension Ladder
description: The D6200-2 fiberglass extension ladders have non-conductive rails making these ladders ideal for working near electricity. With a duty rating of 300 pounds, the D6200-2 series is durable and long lasting. The exclusive ALFLO rung joint means TWIST-PROOF performance on the job. The Traction-Tred D rungs are slip resistant and the side rails are interlocking. The dual action feet are for use on hard or penetrable surfaces and swivel easily. The base and fly sections separate easily to use the base section as a single ladder. The durable rail shield bracket and shoe help protect the bottom of the rail. The fly section rails are pre-pierced at the top for easy field installation of accessories.
short_description:
Features include:

  • Exclusive ALFLO rung joint means TWIST-PROOF performance
  • 1-5/8" Slip-resistant Traction-Tred D-rungs
  • Smooth operating pulley with polypropylene rope
  • Interlocking Side Rails with internal rail guides on bottom of fly section securely connect rails
  • External guides at top of base section securely interlock rails
  • Heavy Duty extruded rung locks are spring loaded to operate smoothly
  • Pre-pierced holes for easy field installation of accessories
  • Base and fly separate easily to use base section as single ladder
  • Combination Rail Shield Bracket and Shoe with Shu-Lok and Slip-Resistant Pad
  • Molded Rung Braces on bottom step for increases durability
  • Mar-Resistant Molded End Caps

meta_description: The D6200-2 fiberglass extension ladders have non-conductive rails making these ladders ideal for working near electricity. With a duty rating of 300 pounds, the D6200-2 series is durable and long lasting. The exclusive ALFLO rung joint means TWIST-PRO
small_image_label: 20' Type IA Fiberglass D-Rung Extension Ladder
thumbnail_label: 20' Type IA Fiberglass D-Rung Extension Ladder
description: The D6200-2 fiberglass extension ladders have non-conductive rails making these ladders ideal for working near electricity. With a duty rating of 300 pounds, the D6200-2 series is durable and long lasting. The exclusive ALFLO rung joint means TWIST-PROOF performance on the job. The TRACTION-TRED D rungs are slip resistant and the side rails are interlocking. The dual action feet are for use on hard or penetrable surfaces and swivel easily. The base and fly sections separate easily to use the base section as a single ladder. The durable rail shield bracket and shoe help protect the bottom of the rail. The fly section rails are pre-pierced at the top for easy field installation of accessories.
short_description:
Features include:

  • Exclusive ALFLO rung joint means TWIST-PROOF performance
  • 1-5/8" Slip-resistant Traction-Tred D-rungs
  • Smooth operating pulley with polypropylene rope
  • Interlocking Side Rails with internal rail guides on bottom of fly section securely connect rails
  • External guides at top of base section securely interlock rails
  • Heavy Duty extruded rung locks are spring loaded to operate smoothly
  • Pre-pierced holes for easy field installation of accessories
  • Base and fly separate easily to use base section as single ladder
  • Combination Rail Shield Bracket and Shoe with SHU-LOK and Slip-Resistant Pad
  • Molded Rung Braces on bottom step for increases durability
  • Mar-Resistant Molded End Caps
summary:
Dimensions

  • Rails Dimension: 3-5/16"
  • Flange Dimension: 1-3/16"
  • Rung Dimension: 1-5/8"
  • Fly Width: 16"
  • Base Width: 19" outside shoes

name: 20' Type IA Aluminum D-Rung Extension Ladder
meta_title: 20' Type IA Aluminum D-Rung Extension Ladder
meta_description: The D1500-2 series aluminum extension ladders have a duty rating of 300 pounds and have extra heavy duty I-beam side rails. The base and fly sections separate easily and can be used separately. Guide brackets help to ease operation when raising and low
small_image_label: 20' Type IA Aluminum D-Rung Extension Ladder
thumbnail_label: 20' Type IA Aluminum D-Rung Extension Ladder
description: The D1500-2 series aluminum extension ladders have a duty rating of 300 pounds and have extra heavy duty I-beam side rails. The base and fly sections separate easily and can be used separately. Guide brackets help to ease operation when raising and lowering the fly section. The exclusive ALFLO rung joint means TWIST-PROOF performance every time. TRACTION-TRED D rungs are slip resistant, and the rugged shoes rest flat or are held in spur position with the SHU-LOK feature. Rugged spring-loaded locks operate smoothly. Mar-resistant end caps protect the surface ladder is resting against.
short_description:
Features include:

  • Exclusive ALFLO rung joint means TWIST-PROOF performance
  • 1-3/4" Slip-resistant Traction-Tred D-rungs
  • Heavy Duty extruded rung locks are spring loaded to operate smoothly
  • Base and fly separate easily for use as an extension or two single sections
  • Smooth operating pulley design – enclosed shape protects pulley
  • Guide brackets mounted at the top and bottom of the rail for durability and smooth operation of fly section
  • Extra heavy duty I-beam rails
  • Rugged spring loaded locks operate smoothly
  • Rugged shoe rests flat or is held in spur position with SHU-LOK feature
  • Stacked rail design provides increased rung width on fly section
  • Mar-resistant end caps

description: The model 560-3 is a 3 section aluminum extension ladder that has a duty rating of 250 pounds. The exclusive ALFLO rung joint means TWIST-PROOF performance. The top fly section can be removed and used separately as a single straight ladder. The bottom base section and intermediate section can be used as a 40' extension ladder. Shoes pivot for use on hard or penetrable surfaces. Rugged spring-loaded locks operate smoothly. Heavy duty rope and double pulley system lift fly and intermediate sections. Rugged spring-loaded locks operate smoothly.

small_image_label: 28' Type I Aluminum D-Rung Equalizer Extension Ladder
thumbnail_label: 28' Type I Aluminum D-Rung Equalizer Extension Ladder
description: D1800-2EQ The Equalizer® series eliminates uneven ground with the factory installed adjustable EverLevel® leveling system. This system precisely adjusts in 3/8" increments up to 8 1/4", making it easy to use. The dual action feet on the ladder are for use on hard or penetrable surfaces and swivel easily. The Traction-Tred D-rungs are slip resistant. The ladder has a duty rating of 250 pounds making it durable, long lasting and able to meet the demands of the job. The exclusive ALFLO rung joint means a TWIST-PROOF® performance every time, and the lightweight aluminum makes it easy to transport.

small_image_label: 6' Type I Fiberglass Parallel Sectional Ladder
thumbnail_label: 6' Type I Fiberglass Parallel Sectional Ladder
description: The S7700 series are interchangeable parallel sectional ladders that are ideal for manhole use and are easy to transport. The sections are joined by heavy duty extruded fittings and secured by a cam driven tension clamp. TRACTION-TRED round rungs are slip resistant, and the exclusive ALFLO rung joint means TWIST-PROOF performance every time. A maximum of three 6' sections can be used. These ladders are made of non-conductive fiberglass rails and have a duty rating of 250 pounds.
short_description:
Features include:

  • Up to 3 sections can be connected to create a straight ladder
  • Sections joined by heavy duty extruded fittings and secured by a cam driven tension clamp
  • Exclusive ALFLO rung joint means TWIST-PROOF performance
  • Slip-resistant Traction-Tred round rungs
  • Must be used in combination with S7702-1 or S7702-2 slip-rsistant shoes
  • Must be use with S7701 end caps

name: PD6203 Type IA Podium Ladder
Group_Name: PD6200 SERIES
meta_title: PD6203 Type IA Podium Ladder
small_image_label: PD6203 Type IA Podium Ladder
thumbnail_label: PD6203 Type IA Podium Ladder
description: Ideal for working at fixed heights and easier to maneuver than scaffolds or lifts. The extra-large platform with toe guard feels like you are standing on the ground and 4X Work Zone allows you to work facing any direction.
short_description:
• 4X Work Zone to reach all directions

  • Extra-large platform for long standing comfort

  • LOCKTOP™ Extended guard rail securely wraps around work zone and holds an arsenal of tools

  • Edge360™ includes an integrated rail shield, EDGE bracing and oversized foot pads

  • 300lbs Load Capacity, Type IA Duty Rating

  • Double riveted slip-resistant TRACTION-TRED® steps

  • Back-up plates reinforce all top connectors

  • Full set of rear horizontals spaced one per foot

  • All steps and two rear horizontals are knee-braced
summary: The NEW PD6203 Podium Ladder is ideal for working at fixed heights and is easier to maneuver than scaffolds or lifts. The extra-large platform with toe guard feels like you are standing on the ground and 4X Work Zone allows you to work facing any direction. This ladder features full aluminum bracing and a full set of rear horizontals. The LOCKTOP™ extended guardrail provides an extra point of contact and conveniently organizes tools and accessories. The newly designed EDGE360™ gives the bottom of the ladder protection from every angle with integrated rail shield, EDGE bracing and over-sized foot pads.

thumbnail_label: WERNER DP6206 6 TYPE 1A DUAL PURPOSE LADDER 2-IN-1 W/ V-RUNG
summary: The DP6206 6ft Fiberglass Dual Purpose Ladder features a 2-in-1 design that can act as both a stepladder and an extension ladder. With a simple Flip and Click the ladder easily converts from one position to the other. The full 3in steps run up the entire ladder offering better standing comfort than a traditional extension ladder at any height. The DP6206 features a padded V-Rung for working on corners, poles, and trees. The oversized, molded PROGUARD BOOTS™ provide firm slip-resistant footing and protect the fiberglass rail.

name: WERNER L6204 4 LEANSAFE FIBERGLASS LADDER TYPE 1A 300LB RATING
meta_title: WERNER L6204 4 LEANSAFE FIBERGLASS LADDER TYPE 1A 300LB RATING
small_image_label: WERNER L6204 4 LEANSAFE FIBERGLASS LADDER TYPE 1A 300LB RATING
thumbnail_label: WERNER L6204 4 LEANSAFE FIBERGLASS LADDER TYPE 1A 300LB RATING
summary: The L6204 Fiberglass 4ft Leaning Ladder is ideal for the professional. With a duty rating of 300lb, it features the LEANSAFE® ladder top that secures tools and accessories, and is uniquely designed to securely lean against flat wall surfaces, wall corners, poles, and wall studs and perform as a standard stepladder. LEANSAFE® ladders have a lower rear rail to front rail connection point allowing the user to get closer to the work when in stepladder mode. Leaning a ladder safely requires that the rear rail is latched to the front rail. Werner’s patent pending single latch design stays engaged when needed, and is centrally located to easily open and close.
meta_keyword: WERNER L6204 4 LEANSAFE FIBERGLASS LADDER TYPE 1A 300LB RATING

name: WERNER PD7304 4 FIBERGLASS PODIUM LADDER TYPE IAA
meta_title: WERNER PD7304 4 FIBERGLASS PODIUM LADDER TYPE IAA

thumbnail_label: WERNER PD7304 4 FIBERGLASS PODIUM LADDER TYPE IAA
summary: The PD7304 Podium Ladder offers the same reach height as a 6ft stepladder and is ideal for working at fixed heights and is easier to maneuver than scaffolds or lifts. The extra-large platform with toe guard feels like you are standing on the ground and 4X Work Zone allows you to work facing any direction. This ladder features full aluminum bracing and a full set of rear horizontals. The LOCKTOP™ extended guardrail provides an extra point of contact and conveniently organizes tools and accessories. The newly designed EDGE360® gives the bottom of the ladder protection from every angle with integrated rail shield, EDGE bracing and over-sized foot pads.

name: WERNER R210010 10 CABLE SRL
meta_title: WERNER R210010 10 CABLE SRL
small_image_label: WERNER R210010 10 CABLE SRL
thumbnail_label: WERNER R210010 10 CABLE SRL
summary: Werner AutoCoil 2 R210010 self-retracting lifelines provide safe, reliable protection for workers while also allowing for more freedom of movement around the jobsite. The lifeline extends and retracts automatically during typical use, but a brake activates in the event of a fall, stopping the worker in a short distance while limiting fall arrest forces. Designed to enhance safety performance and productivity, AutoCoil 2 features impact resistant Thermoplastic (Cable models) and Aluminum (Web models) housings to protect the working components in a compact, lightweight package. All units include a swivel top for anchorage connection and an impact indicator through the snap hook or web stitch. AutoCoil 2 models feature recessed labels and ID Tags to ensure critical information remains with the unit for inspection.
meta_keyword: WERNER R210010 10 CABLE SRL

summary: The R330010 10ft Max Patrol self-retracting lifeline allows more freedom of movement on the job without lock-up that can inhibit range of motion. Lightweight and compact with 10ft of web working length, this next generation SRL offers the highest standard in safety and ergonomics. Heavy duty and lightweight at 2.5lb, Max Patrol is one of the most compact SRLs on the market while exceeding the required safety rating by providing protection for workers up to 400lb Max Patrol includes WebAlert™, brightly colored internal webbing designed to show when the product is damaged and needs to be taken out of service. This extra level of inspectability is critical for professionals who rely on high-quality products. The high visibility webbing ensures lifeline wear and damage is clearly visible.

name: WERNER R430006 BANTAM COMPACT 6FT SRL

thumbnail_label: WERNER R430006 BANTAM COMPACT 6FT SRL
summary: The Bantam R430006 compact self-retracting lifeline provides lightweight safety in the palm of your hand. At just over 2lb per unit, Bantam can be connected at the users back without causing fatigue. As an ANSI Class A device, Bantam is ideal for low clearance applications and accomplishes this while keeping the average arrest forces to < 900lb Available in 6ft length and constructed with tough Dyneema/Polyester webbing, Bantam offers a range of lifeline hook options and can be combined into a twinleg model with an adapter carabiner for 100% tie-off applications.

At just over 2lb per unit, Bantam can be connected at the users back without causing fatigue. As an ANSI Class A device, Bantam is ideal for low clearance applications and accomplishes this while keeping the average arrest forces to < 900lb Available in 6ft length and constructed with tough Dyneema/Polyester webbing, Bantam offers a range of lifeline hook options and can be combined into a twinleg model with an adapter carabiner for 100% tie-off applications.
meta_keyword: WERNER R430006-R 6 BANTAM WEB SRL ALUMINUM REBAR

name: WERNER T6202 TWIN STEP STOOL 2 FIBERGLASS 300LB
meta_title: WERNER T6202 TWIN STEP STOOL 2 FIBERGLASS 300LB
small_image_label: WERNER T6202 TWIN STEP STOOL 2 FIBERGLASS 300LB
thumbnail_label: WERNER T6202 TWIN STEP STOOL 2 FIBERGLASS 300LB
summary: The T6202 Fiberglass 2ft Twin Stepladder offers a high performance dual HolsterTop®with a paint and tool holder for convenience. The internal spreaders are heavy duty and the slip-resistant Traction-Tred® steps are all double riveted and knee braced. This twin Stepladder allows 300lb per side making it ideal for one or two person jobs. The EDGE® molded brace and foot pad combination provide bracing strength and increased protection against damage. Fiberglass rails are non-conductive for working near electricity.
meta_keyword: WERNER T6202 TWIN STEP STOOL 2 FIBERGLASS 300LB
